classTableGroups.title: Nivells de Ranura per Nivells de Conjur

classFeatures: Enemic Predilecte and Natural Explorer improvements|Explorador||6

fluff.name: Explorador
entries: Rough and wild looking, a human stalks alone through the shadows of trees, hunting the orcs he knows are planning a raid on a nearby farm. Clutching a shortsword in each hand, he becomes a whirlwind of steel, cutting down one enemy after another.

After tumbling away from a cone of freezing air, an elf finds her feet and draws back her bow to loose an arrow at the white dragon. Shrugging off the wave of fear that emanates from the dragon like the cold of its breath, she sends one arrow after another to find the gaps between the dragon's thick scales.

Holding his hand high, a half-elf whistles to the hawk that circles high above him, calling the bird back to his side. Whispering instructions in Elvish, he points to the owlbear he's been tracking and sends the hawk to distract the creature while he readies his bow.

Far from the bustle of cities and towns, past the hedges that shelter the most distant farms from the terrors of the wild, amid the dense-packed trees of trackless forests and across wide and empty plains, rangers keep their unending watch.

entries.name: Deadly Hunters
entries: Warriors of the wilderness, rangers specialize in hunting the monsters that threaten the edges of civilization—humanoid raiders, rampaging beasts and monstrosities, terrible giants, and deadly dragons. They learn to track their quarry as a predator does, moving stealthily through the wilds and hiding themselves in brush and rubble. Rangers focus their combat training on techniques that are particularly useful against their specific enemic favorits.

Thanks to their familiarity with the wilds, rangers acquire the ability to cast spells that harness nature's power, much as a druid does. Their spells, like their combat abilities, emphasize speed, stealth, and the hunt. A ranger's talents and abilities are honed with deadly focus on the grim task of protecting the borderlands.

entries.name: Independent Adventurers
entries: Though a ranger might make a living as a hunter, a guide, or a tracker, a ranger's true calling is to defend the outskirts of civilization from the ravages of monsters and humanoid hordes that press in from the wild. In some places, rangers gather in secretive orders or join forces with druidic circles. Many rangers, though, are independent almost to a fault, knowing that, when a dragon or a band of orcs attacks, a ranger might be the first—and possibly the last—line of defense.

This fierce independence makes rangers well suited to adventuring, since they are accustomed to life far from the comforts of a dry bed and a hot bath. Faced with city-bred adventurers who grouse and whine about the hardships of the wild, rangers respond with some mixture of amusement, frustration, and compassion. But they quickly learn that other adventurers who can carry their own weight in a fight against civilization's foes are worth any extra burden. Coddled city folk might not know how to feed themselves or find fresh water in the wild, but they make up for it in other ways.

entries.name: Creating a Explorador
entries: As you create your ranger character, consider the nature of the training that gave you your particular capabilities. Did you train with a single mentor, wandering the wilds together until you mastered the ranger's ways? Did you leave your apprenticeship, or was your mentor slain—perhaps by the same kind of monster that became your enemic predilecte? Or perhaps you learned your skills as part of a band of rangers affiliated with a druidic circle, trained in mystic paths as well as wilderness lore. You might be self-taught, a recluse who learned combat skills, tracking, and even a magical connection to nature through the necessity of surviving in the wilds.

What's the source of your particular hatred of a certain kind of enemy? Did a monster kill someone you loved or destroy your home village? Or did you see too much of the destruction these monsters cause and commit yourself to reining in their depredations? Is your adventuring career a continuation of your work in protecting the borderlands, or a significant change? What made you join up with a band of adventurers? Do you find it challenging to teach new allies the ways of the wild, or do you welcome the relief from solitude that they offer?

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: You can make a ranger quickly by following these suggestions. First, make Destresa your highest ability score, followed by Saviesa. (Some rangers who focus on lluita amb armes duals make Força higher than Destresa.) Second, choose the {@background outlander} background.

I spend a lot of my life away from civilization, keeping to its fringes to protect it. Don't assume that because I don't bend the knee to your king that I haven't done more to protect him than all his knights put together.

Rangers are free-minded wanderers and seekers who patrol the edges of civilized territory, turning back the denizens of the wild lands beyond. It is a thankless job, since their efforts are rarely understood and almost never rewarded. Yet rangers persist in their duties, never doubting that their work makes the world a safer place.

A relationship with civilization informs every ranger's personality and history. Some rangers see themselves as enforcers of the law and bringers of justice on civilization's frontier, answering to no sovereign power. Others are supervivents who eschew civilization altogether. They vanquish monsters to keep themselves safe while they live in and travel through the perilous wild areas of the world. If their efforts also benefit the kingdoms and other civilized realms that they avoid, so be it.
If you're creating or playing a ranger character, the following sections offer ideas for embellishing the character and enhancing your roleplaying experience.

entries.name: View of the World
entries: A ranger's view of the world begins (and sometimes ends) with that character's outlook toward civilized folk and the places they occupy. Some rangers have an attitude toward civilization that's deeply rooted in disdain, while others pity the people they have sworn to protect—though on the battlefield, it's impossible to tell the difference between one ranger and another. Indeed, to those who have seen them operate and been the beneficiaries of their prowess, it scarcely matters why rangers do what they do. That said, no two rangers are likely to express their opinions on any matter in the same way.

If you haven't yet thought about the details of your character's worldview, consider putting a finer point on things by summarizing that viewpoint in a short statement (such as the entries on the following table). How might that feeling affect the way you conduct yourself?

entries.caption: View of the World
rows: Towns and cities are the best places for those who can't survive on their own.
The advancement of civilization is the best way to thwart chaos, but its reach must be monitored.
Towns and cities are a necessary evil, but once the wilderness is purged of supernatural threats, we will need them no more.
Walls are for cowards, who huddle behind them while others do the work of making the world safe.
Visiting a town is not unpleasant, but after a few days I feel the irresistible call to return to the wild.
Cities breed weakness by isolating folk from the harsh lessons of the wild.

entries.name: Homelands
entries: All rangers, regardless of how they came to take up the profession, have a strong connection to the natural world and its various terrains. For some rangers, the wilderness is where they grew up, either as a result of being born there or moving there at a young age. For other rangers, civilization was originally home, but the wilderness became a second homeland.

Think of your character's backstory and decide what terrain feels most like home, whether or not you were born there. What does that terrain say about your personality? Does it influence which spells you choose to learn? Have your experiences there shaped who your enemics predilectes are?

entries.caption: Homelands
rows: You patrolled an ancient forest, darkened and corrupted by several crossings to the Erm de l'Ombra.
As part of a group of nomads, you acquired the skills for surviving in the desert.
Your early life in the Sotafoscor prepared you for the challenges of combating its denizens.
You dwelled on the edge of a swamp, in an area imperiled by land creatures as well as aquatic ones.
Because you grew up among the peaks, finding the best path through the mountains is second nature to you.
You wandered the far north, learning how to protect yourself and prosper in a realm overrun by ice.

entries.name: Sworn Enemy
entries: Every ranger begins with a enemic predilecte (or two). The determination of a enemic predilecte might be tied to a specific event in the character's early life, or it might be entirely a matter of choice.
What spurred your character to select a particular enemy? Was the choice made because of tradition or curiosity, or do you have a grudge to settle?

entries.caption: Sworn Enemies
rows: You seek revenge on nature's behalf for the great transgressions your foe has committed.
Your forebears or predecessors fought these creatures, and so shall you.
You bear no enmity toward your foe. You stalk such creatures as a hunter tracks down a wild animal.
You find your foe fascinating, and you collect books of tales and history concerning it.
You collect tokens of your fallen enemies to remind you of each kill.
You respect your chosen enemy, and you see your battles as a test of respective skills.

classFeature.name: Murri
entries: Choose one skill: {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Athletics}, {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Perception}, {@skill Stealth}, or {@skill Survival}. You gain proficiency in the chosen skill if you don't already have it, and you can add double el teu bonus de competència to ability checks using that skill.
A més, thanks to your extensive wandering, you are able to speak, read, and write two languages (escull).

classFeature.name: Exploració Hàbil
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} per l'explorador a nivell 1, que substitueix el tret Natural Explorer}

Ets un/a/i explorador/a/i i supervivent sense igual, tant en els llocs salvatges com interactuant amb altres que viatgen. Reps els tret Murri, i un benefici extra dels llistats quan arribes a nivell 6 i 10 en aquesta classe.

entries.name: Murri
entries: Escull 1 habilitat amb la que tinguis competència. El teu bonus de competència es duplica per qualsevol tirada d'habilitat feta amb aquesta habilitat.
També aprèns a parlar, llegir, i escriure 2 idiomes extra (escull).

classFeature.name: Exploració Hàbil
entries: {@i tret de ranger a nivell 1 (substitueix Natural Explorer)}
You are an unsurpassed explorer and survivor. Escull un dels beneficis següents, and then choose another one at 6th and 10th level.

classFeature.name: Enemic Predilecte
entries: Començant a nivell 1, tens força experiència estudiant, rastrejant, caçant, i fins i tot parlant amb un tipus d'enemic específic.

Escull un tipus d'nemic predilecte: {@filter aberracions|bestiary|type=aberration}, {@filter bèsties|bestiary|type=beast}, {@filter celestials|bestiary|type=celestial}, {@filter constructes|bestiary|type=construct}, {@filter dracs|bestiary|type=dragon}, {@filter elementals|bestiary|type=elemental}, {@filter fates|bestiary|type=fey}, {@filter diastres|bestiary|type=fiend}, {@filter gegants|bestiary|type=giant}, {@filter monstrositats|bestiary|type=monstrositat}, {@filter llims|bestiary|type=ooze}, {@filter plantes|bestiary|type=plant}, o {@filter no-morts|bestiary|type=undead}. Alternativament, escull dos races {@filter humanoides|bestiary|type=humanoid} (com ara {@creature gnoll||gnolls} i {@creature orc||orcs}) com a enemics predilectes.
Tens avantatge a Saviesa ({@skill Survival}) per rastrejar els teus enemics predilectes, i en tirades d'Intel·ligència per a recordar informació sobre ells.
Quan aprèns aquest tret, també aprèns un idioma (escull) que parlin els teus enemics predilectes (si en parlen algun).

Esculls un enemic predilecte i idioma extres a nivell 6 i a nivell 14 d'aquesta classe. Conforme puges de nivell, les teves decisions haurien de reflexar els tipus de criatures que t'has trobat a les teves aventures.

classFeature.name: Enemic Favorit
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} per l'explorador a nivell 1, que substitueix el tret Enemic Predilecte i funciona amb el tret Foe Slayer}

Quan impactes a una criatura, you can call on your mystical bond with nature to mark the target as your enemic predilecte durant 1 minut or until you lose your concentration (com si et concentressis en un conjur).
The first time a cada torn teu that you hit the enemic predilecte and deal damage to it, including when you mark it, you can increase that damage by {@dice 1d4}.
You can use this feature to mark a enemic predilecte tants cops com el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.
This feature's extra damage increases Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe: to {@dice 1d6} a nivell 6 and to {@dice 1d8} a nivell 14.

classFeature.name: Enemic Favorit
entries: {@i tret de ranger a nivell 1 (substitueix Enemic Predilecte)}

You can call on your bond with nature to mark a creature as your enemic predilecte for a time: you know the {@spell marca de caça} spell, and Saviesa is your habilitat de llançament de conjurs for it. You can use it a certain number of times sense gastar cap ranura de conjur and without requiring concentration—a number of times equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim d'1 cop). En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.
When you gain the Spellcasting feature a nivell 2, marca de caça doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

classFeature.name: Natural Explorer
entries: You are particularly familiar with one type of natural environment and are adept at traveling and surviving in such regions. Choose one type of favored terrain: arctic, coast, desert, forest, grassland, mountain, swamp, or the Sotafoscor. When you make an Intel·ligència or Saviesa check related to your favored terrain, el teu bonus de competència is doubled if you are using a skill that you're proficient in.
While traveling for an hour or more in your favored terrain, reps els beneficis següents:

items: Difficult terrain doesn't slow your group's travel.
Your group can't become lost except by magical means.
Even when you are engaged in another activity while traveling (such as foraging, navigating, or tracking), you remain alert to danger.
If you are traveling alone, you can move stealthily at a normal pace.
When you forage, you find twice as much food as you normally would.
While tracking other creatures, you also learn their exact number, their sizes, and how long ago they passed through the area.

entries: You choose additional favored terrain types at 6th and 10th level.

classFeature.name: Roving
entries: Your walking speed increases by 5, and you gain a climbing speed and a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

classFeature.name: Tireless
entries: Com a acció, you can give yourself a number of punts de vida temporals equal to {@dice 1d10} + el teu modificador de Saviesa. You can use this special action a number of times equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim d'1 cop), i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.
A més, quan acabis un Descans Curt, your {@condition exhaustion} level, if any, is decreased by 1.

classFeature.name: Estil de Lluita
entries: A nivell 2, adoptes un estil de lluita particular. Escull una de les opcions següents You can't take a Estil de Lluita option more than once, even if you later get to choose again.

classFeature.name: Versatilitat Marcial
entries: {@i tret de nivell 2 (millora Estil de Lluita)}

Quan puges de nivell en aquesta classe, you can replace a Estil de Lluita you know with another style available to your class. This change represents a shift of focus in your martial training and practice, causing you to lose the benefits of one style and gain the benefits of another style.

classFeature.name: Spell Versatility
entries: {@i tret de ranger a nivell 2 (millora Spellcasting)}

Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, you can replace one spell you learned from this Spellcasting feature with another spell from the ranger spell list. The new spell must be the same level as the spell you replace.

classFeature.name: Llançament de Conjurs
entries: By the time you reach 2nd level, you have learned to use the magical essence of nature to cast spells, much as a druid does. El {@book capítol 10|PHB|10} té les normes generals del llançament de conjurs i {@book capítol 11|PHB|11} té la {@filter ranger spell list|spells|class=ranger}.

entries.name: Ranures de Conjur
entries: The Ranger table mostra les ranures de conjur que tens per llançar els {@filter ranger spells|spells|class=ranger} de nivells 1 i superior. Per a llançar un conjur, has de gastar una ranura del nivell del conjur (o superior). Recuperes totes les ranures de conjur quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

Per exemple, si coneixes el conjur de nivell 1 {@spell animal friendship} i tens dues ranures, una ranura de nivell 1 i una de nivell 2 disponible, pots llançar {@spell animal friendship} gastant qualsevol de les dues ranures.

entries.name: Conjurs de Nivells 1 i Superiors Coneguts
entries: Coneixes 2 conjurs de nivell 1 (escull) from the ranger spell list.

The Columna de Conjurs Coneguts de la taula de Ranger mostra quan aprendràs més conjurs de ranger (escull). No pots escollir conjurs que siguin de nivell superior a la les ranures de conjur que tens. Per exemple, quan arribes a nivell 5 en aquesta classe, pots aprendre un conjur de nivell 1 o de nivell 2.

A més, quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, pots escollir un dels ranger spells que coneixes i substituir-lo per un altre from the ranger spell list, que també ha de ser d'un nivell igual o inferior al de les teves ranures de conjur.

entries.name: Habilitat de Llançament de Conjurs
entries: La teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs pels conjurs de ranger és la Saviesa, since your magic draws on your attunement to nature. Faràs servir la Saviesa quan un conjur parli de la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs. També faràs servir el teu modificador de Saviesa quan un conjur de Saviesa mencioni: o una CD de salvada o una tirada d'impactar.

classFeature.name: Focus de Llançament de Conjurs
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} per l'explorador a nivell 2}

You can use a {@item druidic focus|phb} com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus ranger spells. A druidic focus might be a sprig of mistletoe or holly, a wand or rod made of yew or another special wood, a staff drawn whole from a living tree, or an object incorporating feathers, fur, bones, and teeth from sacred animals.

classFeature.name: Focus de Llançament de Conjurs
entries: {@i tret de ranger a nivell 2 (millora Spellcasting)}

You can use a {@item druidic focus|phb} com a focus de llançament arcà pels teus ranger spells. See chapter 5, "Equipment," of the Player's Handbook for a list of things that count as druidic focuses.

classFeature.name: Primal Awareness
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} per l'explorador a nivell 3, que substitueix el tret Primeval Awareness feature}

You can focus your awareness through the interconnections of nature: you learn additional spells Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe if you don't already know them, as shown in the Primal Awareness Spells table. These spells don't count against the number of ranger spells you know.
You can cast each of these spells un cop sense gastar cap ranura de conjur. Once you cast a spell in this way, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

classFeature.name: Primal Awareness
entries: {@i tret de ranger a nivell 3 (substitueix Primeval Awareness)}

You can focus your awareness through the interconnections of nature: you learn additional spells Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe if you don't already know them, as shown in the Primal Awareness Spells table. These spells don't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

entries.caption: Primal Awareness Spells
rows: {@spell beast sense}, {@spell locate animals or plants}

entries: You can cast each of these spells un cop sense gastar cap ranura de conjur. Once you cast a spell in this way, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

classFeature.name: Primeval Awareness
entries: Començant a nivell 3, pots, com a acció, and expend one ranger spell slot to focus your awareness on the region around you. Durant 1 minut per level of the spell slot you expend, you can sense whether the following types of creatures are present within 1 mile of you (or within up to 6 miles if you are in your favored terrain): aberrations, celestials, dragons, elementals, fey, diastres, and undead. This feature doesn't reveal the creatures' location or number.

classFeature.name: Ranger Archetype
entries: A nivell 3, tries un arquetip that you strive to emulate de la llista de archetypes disponibles Your choice grants features a nivell 3, i de nou als nivells 7, 11, i 15.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 4, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Versatilitat Marcial
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} per l'explorador a nivell 4}

Quan arribes a un nivell amb aquesta classe que et doni el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica feature, you can replace a Estil de Lluita you know with another Estil de Lluita available to rangers. This replacement represents a shift of focus in your martial practice.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 4 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

classFeature.name: Exploració Hàbil Improvement
entries: You gain an additional benefit quan arribes a nivell 6 en aquesta classe.

entries.name: Roving
entries: Your walking speed increases by 5, and you gain a climbing speed and a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

classFeature.name: Enemic Predilecte and Natural Explorer improvements
entries: A nivell 6, you gain an additional favored terrain.
A nivell 6, you choose one additional enemic predilecte, as well as an associated language. Your choice should reflect the types of monsters you have encountered on your adventures.

classFeature.name: Ranger Archetype feature
entries: A nivell 7, you gain a feature granted to you by your Ranger Archetype.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 8, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Caminar la Terra
entries: Començant a nivell 8, moving through nonmagical difficult terrain costs you no extra movement. You can also pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them if they have thorns, spines, or a similar hazard.
A més, tens avantatge a saving throws against plants that are magically created or manipulated to impede movement, such those created by the {@spell enredar} spell.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 8 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Exploració Hàbil Improvement
entries: You gain an additional benefit quan arribes a nivell 10 en aquesta classe.

entries.name: Tireless
entries: Com a acció, you can give yourself a number of punts de vida temporals equal to {@dice 1d8} + el teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim d'1 punt de vida temporal). You can use this action tants cops com el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.
A més, quan acabis un Descans Curt, your {@condition exhaustion} level, if any, is decreased by 1.

classFeature.name: Fade Away
entries: {@i tret de ranger a nivell 10 (substitueix Hide in Plain Sight)}
Pots, com a acció bonus, to magically become {@condition invisible}, along with any equipment you are wearing or carrying, fins l'inici del teu proper torn.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

classFeature.name: Hide in Plain Sight
entries: Començant a nivell 10, you can spend 1 minute creating camouflage for yourself. You must have access to fresh mud, dirt, plants, soot, and other naturally occurring materials with which to create your camouflage.

Once you are camouflaged in this way, you can try to hide by pressing yourself up against a solid surface, such as a tree or wall, that is at least as tall and wide as you are. Tens un +10 a Destresa ({@skill Stealth}) as long as you remain there without moving or taking actions. Once you move or take an action or a reaction, you must camouflage yourself again per rebre aquest benefici.

classFeature.name: Natural Explorer improvement
entries: You gain an additional favored terrain.

classFeature.name: Nature's Veil
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} per l'explorador a nivell 10, que substitueix el tret Hide in Plain Sight feature}

You draw on the powers of nature to hide yourself from view briefly. Com a acció bonus, you can magically become {@condition invisible}, along with any equipment you are wearing or carrying, fins l'inici del teu proper torn.
Pots emprar aquest tret tants cops com el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

classFeature.name: Ranger Archetype feature
entries: A nivell 11, you gain a feature granted to you by your Ranger Archetype.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 12, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 12 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Enemic Predilecte improvement
entries: A nivell 14, you choose one additional enemic predilecte, as well as an associated language. Your choice should reflect the types of monsters you have encountered on your adventures.

classFeature.name: Vanish
entries: Començant a nivell 14, you can use l'acció {@action Amagar-se} com a acció bonus en el teu torn. Also, you can't be tracked by nonmagical means, unless you choose to leave a trail.

classFeature.name: Ranger Archetype feature
entries: A nivell 15, you gain a feature granted to you by your Ranger Archetype.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 16, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 16 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Feral Senses
entries: A nivell 18, you gain preternatural senses that help you fight creatures you can't see. When you attack a creature you can't see, your inability to see it doesn't impose disadvantage on your attack rolls against it. You are also aware of the location of any {@condition invisible} creature a 30 peus de tu, provided that the creature isn't hidden from you and you aren't {@condition blinded} or {@condition deafened}.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 19, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 19 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Foe Slayer
entries: A nivell 20, you become an unparalleled hunter of your enemies. Un cop a cada torn teu, you can add el teu modificador de Saviesa to the attack roll or the damage roll of an attack you make against one of your enemics predilectes. You can choose to use this feature before or after the roll, but before any effects of the roll are applied.

classFeature.name: Murri
entries: Choose one skill: {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Athletics}, {@skill History}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Perception}, {@skill Stealth}, or {@skill Survival}. You gain proficiency in the chosen skill if you don't already have it, and you can add double el teu bonus de competència to ability checks using that skill.
A més, thanks to your extensive wandering, you are able to speak, read, and write two languages (escull).

classFeature.name: Exploració Hàbil
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} per l'explorador a nivell 1, que substitueix el tret Natural Explorer}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

You are an unsurpassed explorer and survivor, both in the wilderness and in dealing with others on your travels. You gain the Murri benefit below, and you gain an additional benefit below quan arribes a nivell 6 and 10th level en aquesta classe.

entries.name: Murri
entries: Escull 1 habilitat amb la que tinguis competència. El teu bonus de competència is doubled for any ability check you make that uses the chosen skill.
You can also speak, read, and write two additional languages (escull).

classFeature.name: Exploració Hàbil
entries: {@i tret de ranger a nivell 1 (substitueix Natural Explorer)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}
You are an unsurpassed explorer and survivor. Escull un dels beneficis següents, and then choose another one at 6th and 10th level.

classFeature.name: Enemic Predilecte
entries: Començant a nivell 1, you have significant experience studying, tracking, hunting, and even talking to a certain type of enemy.

Choose a type of enemic predilecte: {@filter aberrations|bestiary|type=aberration}, {@filter beasts|bestiary|type=beast}, {@filter celestials|bestiary|type=celestial}, {@filter constructs|bestiary|type=construct}, {@filter dragons|bestiary|type=dragon}, {@filter elementals|bestiary|type=elemental}, {@filter fey|bestiary|type=fey}, {@filter diastres|bestiary|type=fiend}, {@filter giants|bestiary|type=giant}, {@filter monstrositats|bestiary|type=monstrositat}, {@filter oozes|bestiary|type=ooze}, {@filter plants|bestiary|type=plant}, or {@filter undead|bestiary|type=undead}. Alternativament, you can select two races of {@filter humanoid|bestiary|type=humanoid} (such as {@creature gnoll||gnolls} i {@creature orc||orcs}) as enemics predilectes.
Tens avantatge a Saviesa ({@skill Survival}) to track your enemics predilectes, as well as on Intel·ligència checks to recall information about them.
When you gain this feature, you also learn one language (escull) that is spoken by your enemics predilectes, if they speak one at all.

You choose one additional enemic predilecte, as well as an associated language, at 6th and 14th level. As you gain levels, your choices should reflect the types of monsters you have encountered on your adventures.

classFeature.name: Enemic Favorit
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} per l'explorador a nivell 1, que substitueix el tret Enemic Predilecte feature and works with the Foe Slayer feature}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

Quan impactes a una criatura, you can call on your mystical bond with nature to mark the target as your enemic predilecte durant 1 minut or until you lose your concentration (com si et concentressis en un conjur).
The first time a cada torn teu that you hit the enemic predilecte and deal damage to it, including when you mark it, you can increase that damage by {@dice 1d4}.
You can use this feature to mark a enemic predilecte tants cops com el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.
This feature's extra damage increases Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe: to {@dice 1d6} a nivell 6 and to {@dice 1d8} a nivell 14.

classFeature.name: Enemic Favorit
entries: {@i tret de ranger a nivell 1 (substitueix Enemic Predilecte)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

You can call on your bond with nature to mark a creature as your enemic predilecte for a time: you know the {@spell marca de caça} spell, and Saviesa is your habilitat de llançament de conjurs for it. You can use it a certain number of times sense gastar cap ranura de conjur and without requiring concentration—a number of times equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim d'1 cop). En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.
When you gain the Spellcasting feature a nivell 2, marca de caça doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

classFeature.name: Natural Explorer
entries: You are particularly familiar with one type of natural environment and are adept at traveling and surviving in such regions. Choose one type of favored terrain: arctic, coast, desert, forest, grassland, mountain, swamp, or the Sotafoscor. When you make an Intel·ligència or Saviesa check related to your favored terrain, el teu bonus de competència is doubled if you are using a skill that you're proficient in.
While traveling for an hour or more in your favored terrain, reps els beneficis següents:

items: Difficult terrain doesn't slow your group's travel.
Your group can't become lost except by magical means.
Even when you are engaged in another activity while traveling (such as foraging, navigating, or tracking), you remain alert to danger.
If you are traveling alone, you can move stealthily at a normal pace.
When you forage, you find twice as much food as you normally would.
While tracking other creatures, you also learn their exact number, their sizes, and how long ago they passed through the area.

entries: You choose additional favored terrain types at 6th and 10th level.

classFeature.name: Roving
entries: Your walking speed increases by 5, and you gain a climbing speed and a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

classFeature.name: Tireless
entries: Com a acció, you can give yourself a number of punts de vida temporals equal to {@dice 1d10} + el teu modificador de Saviesa. You can use this special action a number of times equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim d'1 cop), i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.
A més, quan acabis un Descans Curt, your {@condition exhaustion} level, if any, is decreased by 1.

classFeature.name: Superioritat Bèl·lica
entries: A nivell 2, aprèns maniobres que empren daus especials anomenats daus de superioritat.

entries.name: Maneuvers
entries: You learn two {@filter maniobres|optionalfeatures|feature type=mv:b} (escull), which are chosen from the list of maneuvers available to fighters with the Battle Master archetype. Many maneuvers enhance an attack in some way. You can use only one maneuver per attack.
You learn one additional maneuver (escull) at 5th, 9, 13, i 17s. Each time you learn a new maneuver, you can also replace one maneuver you know with a different one.

entries.name: Daus de superioritat
entries: You have four daus de superioritat, que són {@dice d8}s. Un dau de superioritat is expended when you use it. You regain all of your expended daus de superioritat quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.
Tens un altre dau de superioritat a nivell 9 and one more a nivell 17.

entries.name: Tirades de salvació
entries: Some of your maneuvers require your target to make a saving throw to resist the maneuver's effects. The saving throw DC is calculated as follows:

classFeature.name: Estil de Lluita
entries: A nivell 2, adoptes un estil de lluita particular. Escull una de les opcions següents You can't take a Estil de Lluita option more than once, even if you later get to choose again.

classFeature.name: Versatilitat Marcial
entries: {@i tret de nivell 2 (millora Estil de Lluita)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

Quan puges de nivell en aquesta classe, you can replace a Estil de Lluita you know with another style available to your class. This change represents a shift of focus in your martial training and practice, causing you to lose the benefits of one style and gain the benefits of another style.

classFeature.name: Poultices
entries: A nivell 3, you can create special herbal poultices that have healing power comparable to some potions. You can spend 1 hour gathering herbs and preparing herbal poultices using treated bandages to create a number of such poultices equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (minimum 1). You can carry a number of poultices at one time equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (minimum 1). The poultices you create cannot be applied by anyone but you. After 24 hours, any poultices that you have not used lose their potency.

If you spend 1 minute applying one of your poultices to a wounded humanoid creature, thereby expending its use, that creature regains {@dice 1d6} punts de vida for every two ranger levels you have (arrodonint a l'alça).

classFeature.name: Primal Awareness
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} per l'explorador a nivell 3, que substitueix el tret Primeval Awareness feature}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

You can focus your awareness through the interconnections of nature: you learn additional spells Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe if you don't already know them, as shown in the Primal Awareness Spells table. These spells don't count against the number of ranger spells you know.
You can cast each of these spells un cop sense gastar cap ranura de conjur. Once you cast a spell in this way, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

classFeature.name: Primal Awareness
entries: {@i tret de ranger a nivell 3 (substitueix Primeval Awareness)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

You can focus your awareness through the interconnections of nature: you learn additional spells Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe if you don't already know them, as shown in the Primal Awareness Spells table. These spells don't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

entries.caption: Primal Awareness Spells
rows: {@spell beast sense}, {@spell locate animals or plants}

entries: You can cast each of these spells un cop sense gastar cap ranura de conjur. Once you cast a spell in this way, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

classFeature.name: Primeval Awareness
entries: Començant a nivell 3, pots, com a acció, to focus your awareness on the region around you. For the next minute, you can sense whether the following types of creatures are present within 1 mile of you (or within up to 6 miles if you are in your favored terrain): aberrations, celestials, dragons, elementals, fey, diastres, and undead. This feature doesn't reveal the creatures' location or number.
Un cop empris aquest tret no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg

classFeature.name: Ranger Archetype
entries: A nivell 3, tries un arquetip that you strive to emulate de la llista de archetypes disponibles Your choice grants features a nivell 3, i de nou als nivells 7, 11, i 15.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 4, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Versatilitat Marcial
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} per l'explorador a nivell 4}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

Quan arribes a un nivell amb aquesta classe que et doni el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica feature, you can replace a Estil de Lluita you know with another Estil de Lluita available to rangers. This replacement represents a shift of focus in your martial practice.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 4 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Additional Maneuvers
entries: A nivell 5, you learn one additional maneuver (escull), which is chosen from the list of maneuvers available to fighters with the Battle Master archetype.

classFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

classFeature.name: Exploració Hàbil Improvement
entries: You gain an additional benefit quan arribes a nivell 6 en aquesta classe.

entries.name: Roving
entries: Your walking speed increases by 5, and you gain a climbing speed and a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

classFeature.name: Enemic Predilecte and Natural Explorer improvements
entries: A nivell 6, you gain an additional favored terrain.
A nivell 6, you choose one additional enemic predilecte, as well as an associated language. Your choice should reflect the types of monsters you have encountered on your adventures.

classFeature.name: Ranger Archetype feature
entries: A nivell 7, you gain a feature granted to you by your Ranger Archetype.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 8, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Caminar la Terra
entries: Començant a nivell 8, moving through nonmagical difficult terrain costs you no extra movement. You can also pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them if they have thorns, spines, or a similar hazard.
A més, tens avantatge a saving throws against plants that are magically created or manipulated to impede movement, such those created by the {@spell enredar} spell.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 8 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Additional Maneuvers
entries: A nivell 9, you learn one additional maneuver (escull), which is chosen from the list of maneuvers available to fighters with the Battle Master archetype.

classFeature.name: Natural Antivenom
entries: Començant a nivell 9, tens avantatge a saving throws against poison and have resistance to poison damage. A més, you can use one of your poultices to cure one poison effect on the creature you are applying it to, in addition to restoring punts de vida.

classFeature.name: Exploració Hàbil Improvement
entries: You gain an additional benefit quan arribes a nivell 10 en aquesta classe.

entries.name: Tireless
entries: Com a acció, you can give yourself a number of punts de vida temporals equal to {@dice 1d8} + el teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim d'1 punt de vida temporal). You can use this action tants cops com el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.
A més, quan acabis un Descans Curt, your {@condition exhaustion} level, if any, is decreased by 1.

classFeature.name: Fade Away
entries: {@i tret de ranger a nivell 10 (substitueix Hide in Plain Sight)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}
Pots, com a acció bonus, to magically become {@condition invisible}, along with any equipment you are wearing or carrying, fins l'inici del teu proper torn.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

classFeature.name: Hide in Plain Sight
entries: Començant a nivell 10, you can spend 1 minute creating camouflage for yourself. You must have access to fresh mud, dirt, plants, soot, and other naturally occurring materials with which to create your camouflage.

Once you are camouflaged in this way, you can try to hide by pressing yourself up against a solid surface, such as a tree or wall, that is at least as tall and wide as you are. Tens un +10 a Destresa ({@skill Stealth}) as long as you remain there without moving or taking actions. Once you move or take an action or a reaction, you must camouflage yourself again per rebre aquest benefici.

classFeature.name: Natural Explorer improvement
entries: You gain an additional favored terrain.

classFeature.name: Nature's Veil
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} per l'explorador a nivell 10, que substitueix el tret Hide in Plain Sight feature}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

You draw on the powers of nature to hide yourself from view briefly. Com a acció bonus, you can magically become {@condition invisible}, along with any equipment you are wearing or carrying, fins l'inici del teu proper torn.
Pots emprar aquest tret tants cops com el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

classFeature.name: Ranger Archetype feature
entries: A nivell 11, you gain a feature granted to you by your Ranger Archetype.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 12, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 12 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Additional Maneuvers
entries: A nivell 13, you learn one additional maneuver (escull), which is chosen from the list of maneuvers available to fighters with the Battle Master archetype.

classFeature.name: Call Natural Allies
entries: Començant a nivell 13, when you are in an area of your favored terrain, you can call natural creatures from that terrain to fight on your behalf, using your attunement to the natural world to convince them to aid you. The DM chooses beasts appropriate to the terrain to come to your aid from among those that could hear you and that are within 1 mile of you, in one of the following groups:

items: One beast of challenge rating 2 or lower
Two beasts of challenge rating 1 or lower
Four beasts of challenge rating 1/2 or lower
Eight beasts of challenge rating 1/4 or lower

entries: These beasts approach you from their current location, and will fight alongside you, attacking any creatures that are hostile to you. They are friendly to you and your comrades, and you roll initiative for the called creatures as a group, which takes its own turns. The DM has the creatures' statistics.

After 1 hour, these beasts return to their previous location. Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again in the same general area durant 24 hores, since the same animals will not repeatedly heed your call.

classFeature.name: Enemic Predilecte improvement
entries: A nivell 14, you choose one additional enemic predilecte, as well as an associated language. Your choice should reflect the types of monsters you have encountered on your adventures.

classFeature.name: Vanish
entries: Començant a nivell 14, you can use l'acció {@action Amagar-se} com a acció bonus en el teu torn. Also, you can't be tracked by nonmagical means, unless you choose to leave a trail.

classFeature.name: Ranger Archetype feature
entries: A nivell 15, you gain a feature granted to you by your Ranger Archetype.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 16, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 16 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Additional Maneuvers
entries: A nivell 17, you learn one additional maneuver (escull), which is chosen from the list of maneuvers available to fighters with the Battle Master archetype.

classFeature.name: Relentless
entries: Començant a nivell 17, quan tires per iniciativa and have no daus de superioritat remaining, you regain 1 dau de superioritat.

classFeature.name: Feral Senses
entries: A nivell 18, you gain preternatural senses that help you fight creatures you can't see. When you attack a creature you can't see, your inability to see it doesn't impose disadvantage on your attack rolls against it. You are also aware of the location of any {@condition invisible} creature a 30 peus de tu, provided that the creature isn't hidden from you and you aren't {@condition blinded} or {@condition deafened}.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 19, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 19 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger feature.}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Foe Slayer
entries: A nivell 20, you become an unparalleled hunter of your enemies. Un cop a cada torn teu, you can add el teu modificador de Saviesa to the attack roll or the damage roll of an attack you make against one of your enemics predilectes. You can choose to use this feature before or after the roll, but before any effects of the roll are applied.

classFeature.name: Ambuscade
entries: Rangers strike first and strike hard. Quan tires per iniciativa, you gain a special turn that takes place before other creatures can act. On this turn, pots, com a acció, to take either l'acció {@action Atacar} or {@action Amagar-se}.
If more than one creature in an encounter has this feature, they all act first in order of initiative, then the regular initiative order begins.
If you would normally be surprised at the start of an encounter, you are not surprised but you do not gain this extra turn.

classFeature.name: Escaramussador's Stealth
entries: Començant a nivell 2, you combine speed and stealth in combat to make yourself hard to pin down. You are difficult to detect even if you attack or otherwise take actions that would normally reveal your presence.

A l'inici del teu torn, pick a creature you are hidden from. You remain hidden from that creature durant el teu torn, regardless of your actions or the actions of other creatures. Com a acció bonus al final del teu torn, pots fer una tirada de Destresa ({@skill Stealth}) to hide again if you fulfill the conditions needed to hide. Otherwise, creatures are aware of you al final del teu torn.

classFeature.name: Spirit Path
entries: A nivell 3, you form a bond with a nature spirit—a companion forged by your link to the wild. This spirit companion protects you as you travel and watches your back in battle. You choose a ranger path that shapes your spirit companion and its magic: the Guardian, the Seeker, or the Stalker. La teva elecció t'otorga trets als nivells 3, 7, 11, i 15.

entries.name: Spirit Companion
entries: All rangers gain a spirit companion and the ability to invoke its magical power. (Your spirit companion grants you one benefit you can call on in this playtest version of the revised ranger, with more benefits gained at higher levels.) You regain your ability to call on your spirit companion in this way quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

Once per day com a acció bonus, you can command your spirit companion to materialize as a living creature, determined by the ranger path you choose. Your spirit companion manifests as an animal durant 1 minut or until your concentration is broken (as if you are concentrating on a spell). You can also dismiss it com a acció bonus.

The manifested creature gains a bonus to attack rolls and saving throws equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa. It uses the punts de vida in the animal's stat block or half els teus punts de vida màxims, whichever is higher.
The manifested creature takes its turn on your initiative and acts immediately after you. You control its actions, even if you are {@condition unconscious} or otherwise unable to act.

classFeature.name: Enemic Predilecte
entries: Començant a nivell 1, you have significant experience studying, tracking, hunting, and even talking to a certain type of enemy commonly encountered in the wilds.

Choose a type of enemic predilecte: {@filter beasts|bestiary|type=beast}, {@filter fey|bestiary|type=fey}, {@filter humanoids|bestiary|type=humanoid}, {@filter monstrositats|bestiary|type=monstrositat}, or {@filter undead|bestiary|type=undead}. Tens un +2 a damage rolls with weapon attacks against creatures of the chosen type. A més, tens avantatge a Saviesa ({@skill Survival}) to track your enemics predilectes, as well as on Intel·ligència checks to recall information about them.

When you gain this feature, you also learn one language (escull), typically one spoken by your enemic predilecte or creatures associated with it. However, you are free to pick any language you wish to learn.

classFeature.name: Natural Explorer
entries: You are a master of navigating the natural world, and you react with swift and decisive action when attacked. This grants you the following benefits:

items: You ignore difficult terrain.
Tens avantatge a tirades d'Iniciativa.
On your first turn during combat, tens avantatge a attack rolls against creatures that have not yet acted.

entries: A més, you are skilled at navigating the wilderness. Reps els beneficis següents when traveling for an hour or more:

items: Difficult terrain doesn't slow your group's travel.
Your group can't become lost except by magical means.
Even when you are engaged in another activity while traveling (such as foraging, navigating, or tracking), you remain alert to danger.
If you are traveling alone, you can move stealthily at a normal pace.
When you forage, you find twice as much food as you normally would.
While tracking other creatures, you also learn their exact number, their sizes, and how long ago they passed through the area.

classFeature.name: Estil de Lluita
entries: A nivell 2, adoptes un estil de lluita particular. Escull una de les opcions següents You can't take a Estil de Lluita option more than once, even if you later get to choose again.

classFeature.name: Versatilitat Marcial
entries: {@i tret de nivell 2 (millora Estil de Lluita)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger feature.}

Quan puges de nivell en aquesta classe, you can replace a Estil de Lluita you know with another style available to your class. This change represents a shift of focus in your martial training and practice, causing you to lose the benefits of one style and gain the benefits of another style.

classFeature.name: Llançament de Conjurs
entries: By the time you reach 2nd level, you have learned to use the magical essence of nature to cast spells, much as a druid does. El {@book capítol 10|PHB|10} té les normes generals del llançament de conjurs i {@book capítol 11|PHB|11} té la {@filter ranger spell list|spells|class=ranger}.

entries.name: Ranures de Conjur
entries: The Ranger table mostra les ranures de conjur que tens per llançar els {@filter ranger spells|spells|class=ranger} de nivells 1 i superior. Per a llançar un conjur, has de gastar una ranura del nivell del conjur (o superior). Recuperes totes les ranures de conjur quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

Per exemple, si coneixes el conjur de nivell 1 {@spell animal friendship} i tens dues ranures, una ranura de nivell 1 i una de nivell 2 disponible, pots llançar {@spell animal friendship} gastant qualsevol de les dues ranures.

entries.name: Conjurs de Nivells 1 i Superiors Coneguts
entries: Coneixes 2 conjurs de nivell 1 (escull) from the ranger spell list.

The Columna de Conjurs Coneguts de la taula de Ranger mostra quan aprendràs més conjurs de ranger (escull). No pots escollir conjurs que siguin de nivell superior a la les ranures de conjur que tens. Per exemple, quan arribes a nivell 5 en aquesta classe, pots aprendre un conjur de nivell 1 o de nivell 2.

A més, quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, pots escollir un dels ranger spells que coneixes i substituir-lo per un altre from the ranger spell list, que també ha de ser d'un nivell igual o inferior al de les teves ranures de conjur.

entries.name: Habilitat de Llançament de Conjurs
entries: La teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs pels conjurs de ranger és la Saviesa, since your magic draws on your attunement to nature. Faràs servir la Saviesa quan un conjur parli de la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs. També faràs servir el teu modificador de Saviesa quan un conjur de Saviesa mencioni: o una CD de salvada o una tirada d'impactar.

classFeature.name: Primeval Awareness
entries: Començant a nivell 3, your mastery of ranger lore allows you to establish a powerful link to beasts and to the land around you.

You have an innate ability to communicate with beasts, and they recognize you as a kindred spirit. Through sounds and gestures, you can communicate simple ideas to a beast com a acció, and can read its basic mood and intent. You learn its emotional state, whether it is affected by magic of any sort, its short-term needs (such as food or safety), and actions you can take (if any) to persuade it to not attack.
You cannot use this ability against a creature that you have attacked within the past 10 minutes.

A més, you can attune your senses to determine if any of your enemics predilectes lurk nearby. By spending 1 uninterrupted minute in concentration (com si et concentressis en un conjur), you can sense whether any of your enemics predilectes are present within 5 miles of you. This feature reveals which of your enemics predilectes are present, their numbers, and the creatures' general direction and distance (in miles) from you.
If there are multiple groups of your enemics predilectes within range, you learn this information for each group.

classFeature.name: Ranger Conclave
entries: A nivell 3, you choose to emulate the ideals and training of a ranger conclave de la llista de conclaves disponibles La teva elecció t'otorga trets als nivells 3, 5, 7, 11, i 15.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 4, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Versatilitat Marcial
entries: {@i {@variantrule optional class features|tce|Tret opcional} per l'explorador a nivell 4}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger feature.}

Quan arribes a un nivell amb aquesta classe que et doni el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica feature, you can replace a Estil de Lluita you know with another Estil de Lluita available to rangers. This replacement represents a shift of focus in your martial practice.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 4 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger feature.}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Ranger Conclave feature
entries: A nivell 5, you gain a feature granted to you by your Ranger Conclave.

classFeature.name: Greater Enemic Predilecte
entries: A nivell 6, you are ready to hunt even deadlier game. Choose a type of greater enemic predilecte: {@filter aberrations|bestiary|type=aberration}, {@filter celestials|bestiary|type=celestial}, {@filter constructs|bestiary|type=construct}, {@filter dragons|bestiary|type=dragon}, {@filter elementals|bestiary|type=elemental}, {@filter diastres|bestiary|type=fiend}, or {@filter giants|bestiary|type=giant}. You gain all the benefits against this chosen enemy that you normally gain against your enemic predilecte, including an additional language. Your bonus to damage rolls against all your enemics predilectes increases to +4.
A més, tens avantatge a saving throws against the spells and abilities used by a greater enemic predilecte.

classFeature.name: Ranger Conclave feature
entries: A nivell 7, you gain a feature granted to you by your Ranger Conclave.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 8, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Fleet of Foot
entries: Començant a nivell 8, you can use l'acció {@action Córrer} com a acció bonus en el teu torn.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 8 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger feature.}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Hide in Plain Sight
entries: Començant a nivell 10, you can remain perfectly still for long periods of time to set up ambushes.

When you attempt to hide en el teu torn, you can opt to not move on that turn. If you avoid moving, creatures that attempt to detect you take a -10 penalty to their Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) fins l'inici del teu proper torn. You lose this benefit if you move or fall {@condition prone}, either voluntarily or because of some external effect. You are still automatically detected if any effect or action causes you to no longer be hidden.
If you are still hidden en el teu proper torn, you can continue to remain motionless and gain this benefit until you are detected.

classFeature.name: Ranger Conclave feature
entries: A nivell 11, you gain a feature granted to you by your Ranger Conclave.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 12, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 12 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger feature.}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Vanish
entries: Començant a nivell 14, you can use l'acció {@action Amagar-se} com a acció bonus en el teu torn. Also, you can't be tracked by nonmagical means, unless you choose to leave a trail.

classFeature.name: Ranger Conclave feature
entries: A nivell 15, you gain a feature granted to you by your Ranger Conclave.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 16, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 16 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger feature.}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Feral Senses
entries: A nivell 18, you gain preternatural senses that help you fight creatures you can't see. When you attack a creature you can't see, your inability to see it doesn't impose disadvantage on your attack rolls against it. You are also aware of the location of any {@condition invisible} creature a 30 peus de tu, provided that the creature isn't hidden from you and you aren't {@condition blinded} or {@condition deafened}.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 19, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls un {@5etools tret|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 19 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

{@note Note that this feature is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger feature.}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Foe Slayer
entries: A nivell 20, you become an unparalleled hunter. Un cop a cada torn teu, you can add el teu modificador de Saviesa to the attack roll or the damage roll of an attack you make. You can choose to use this feature before or after the roll, but before any effects of the roll are applied.

subclassFeature.name: Beast Master
entries: The Beast Master archetype embodies a friendship between the civilized races and the beasts of the world. United in focus, beast and ranger work as one to fight the monstrous foes that threaten civilization and the wilderness alike. Emulating the Beast Master archetype means committing yourself to this ideal, working in partnership with an animal as its companion and friend.

subclassFeature.name: Primal Companion
entries: {@i tret de Beast Master variant a nivell 3, que substitueix el tret Ranger's Companion feature}

You magically summon a primal beast, which draws strength from your bond with nature. The beast is friendly to you and your companions and obeys your commands. Choose its stat block—{@creature Beast of the Land|TCE}, {@creature Beast of the Sea|TCE}, or {@creature Beast of the Sky|TCE}—which uses el teu bonus de competència (BC) in several places. You also determine the kind of animal the beast is, choosing a kind appropriate for the stat block. Whatever kind you choose, the beast bears primal markings, indicating its mystical origin.

In combat, the beast acts durant el teu torn. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but the only action it takes is l'acció {@action Esquivar}, unless you take a bonus action en el teu torn to command it to take another action. That action can be one in its stat block or some other action. You can also sacrifice one of your attacks quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar} to command the beast to take l'acció {@action Atacar}. Si et quedes {@condition incapacitated}, the beast can take any action of its choice, not just {@action Esquivar}.

If the beast has died within the last hour, pots, com a acció, to touch it and expend a spell slot of 1st level or higher. The beast returns to life after 1 minute with all its punts de vida restored.

Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, you can summon a different primal beast. The new beast appears en un espai desocupat a 5 peus de tu, and you choose its stat block and appearance. If you already have a beast from this feature, it vanishes when the new beast appears. The beast also vanishes if you die.

subclassFeature.name: Ranger Companion Options
entries: {@i tret de Beast Master a nivell 3 (millora Ranger's Companion)}

While wandering the wilds, a ranger encounters many sorts of animals, some of which the ranger might befriend. This friendship can arise from successful use of the {@skill Animal Handling} or the {@spell animal friendship} spell. If the resulting bond is strong enough, the animal might join the ranger on adventures.

A ranger who has the Beast Master archetype can form an even stronger bond, feeling almost like a sibling to an animal. A special type of beast awaits a Beast Master in the wilds, a creature whose lineage stretches back to the beginnings of the world: a primal beast known as a {@creature Bèstia de l'Aire|UAClassFeatureVariants} or a {@creature Bèstia de la Terra|UAClassFeatureVariants}. Such a creature seeks out the type of companionship that a Beast Master offers, ready for the two of them to battle the imbalances in the natural world.

The primal beast is a special creature that a Beast Master can choose for the Ranger's Companion feature. When choosing such a creature, you decide whether it is a Bèstia de l'Aire or the Earth, and en determines l'aparença. Stories describe primal beasts that mystically change form to align with the spirit of their companion.
When a primal beast is met apart from a Beast Master, the creature takes the form a regular beast of challenge rating 1/4 or lower, as determined by the DM.

subclassFeature.name: Ranger's Companion
entries: You gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and is trained to fight alongside you. Choose a {@filter beast that is no larger than Medium and that has a challenge rating of 1/4 or lower|bestiary|challenge rating=[&0;&1/4]|type=beast|size=f;d;t;s;m|miscellaneous=!swarm}.
