entries: {@i tret de Swarmkeeper a nivell 11}

Com a acció, you can magically form one of the spirits of your swarm into the shape of a Tiny beast (escull). The transformation dura 1 hora, at which point the spirit disappears. For the duration, the spirit has a speed of 40 feet, which it can use to walk, climb, fly, or swim. The spirit has your senses and telepathically relays what it sees and hears to you. Durant el teu torn, you can speak through the spirit, telepathically command it to move, and it can {@action Amagar-se} using your bonus to Destresa ({@skill Stealth}). The spirit has AC 18. If it takes damage, you ha de salvar per Saviesa. (la CD és 10, or half the damage dealt, whichever is higher) or the spirit disappears.
Com a acció, you can dismiss the spirit early. If you do, you can magically teleport en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of where the spirit disappeared.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Llarg. You can also use it again by expending a spell slot of 3rd level or higher.

subclassFeature.name: Storm of Minions
entries: {@i tret de Swarmkeeper a nivell 15}

Your swarm can expel a seething storm of spirits that drains life from others. Com a acció, you create a magical sphere filled with an enraged swarm centered on a point que puguis veure a 120 peus de tu. The sphere has a 10-foot-radius and dura 1 minut. The sphere is difficult terrain for creatures other than you. A creature other than you that starts its turn in the sphere's area ha de salvar per Constitució contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur. Si falla, the creature takes {@damage 2d8} de dany necròtic and is {@condition blinded} fins el final del seu proper torn. Si supera, rep la meitat del dany and isn't {@condition blinded}. A l'inici del teu torn, if any number of Small or larger creatures took necrotic damage from the swarm, you regain {@dice 1d8} punts de vida. Als torns posteriors, pots, com a acció bonus, to move the sphere fins a 30 peus.
When you activate this feature, you can choose any number of creatures que puguis veure to be unaffected by it.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Llarg. You can also use it again by expending a spell slot of 4th level or higher.

subclassFeature.name: Deep Stalker
entries: {@note Note that this subclass is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger subclass.}

Many Deep Stalkers are elves, as those folk know all too well the threat posed by the drow. Deep Stalkers scout for new passages into the Sotafoscor, carefully mapping them and working to ensure they remain watched at all times. They venture into the depths on long, dangerous patrols, disappearing for months at a time. Many of them never return. Deep Stalkers master spells useful in navigating the Sotafoscor, and their combat tactics focus on ambush, surprise, and stealth. They fight alone or in small groups in hostile territory, relying on clever tactics to carry the day.

subclassFeature.name: Sotafoscor Scout
entries: A nivell 3, you master the art of the ambush. On your first turn during combat, Tens un +10 a your speed. If you use the attack action on that turn, you can make one additional attack. You gain an additional benefit on all turns after your first turn. At the end of each such turn, you can attempt to hide com a acció bonus if you meet the normal requirements for hiding.

subclassFeature.name: Iron Mind
entries: A nivell 7, tens competència en salvades de Saviesa.

subclassFeature.name: Stalker's Flurry
entries: Començant a nivell 11, you have the ability to ensure that your attacks count. If you miss with an attack durant el teu torn, you can immediately make an additional attack. You can gain one additional attack durant el teu torn with this ability.

subclassFeature.name: Stalker's Dodge
entries: A nivell 15, you master the ability to disrupt an opponent's attacks. Si una criatura attacks you and does not have advantage on the attack roll, pots, com a reacció, grant it disadvantage on the attack roll. You must use this ability before you know the result of the attack.

subclassFeature.name: Horizon Walker
entries: {@note Note that this subclass is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger subclass.}

Rangers of the Horizon Conclave guard the world against threats that originate from other planes. They seek out planar portals and keep watch over them, venturing to the outer and inner planes as needed to defeat threats.

subclassFeature.name: Planar Warrior
entries: A nivell 3, you learn to draw on the energy of the planes to augment your attacks.

Com a acció bonus, escull una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu. Until the end of this turn, your attacks contra aquella criatura ignore its damage resistances, and the next time you hit it on this turn, it takes an additional {@damage 1d6} de dany de força.

subclassFeature.name: Portal Lore
entries: A nivell 3, you gain the ability to detect the presence of planar portals. Com a acció, you detect the distance and direction to any planar portals within 1,000 feet of you. You also sense which plane of existence each portal leads to. However, if magic obscures any details of a portal, this feature doesn't reveal them.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg. Alternativament, you can use the feature again if you expend a spell slot of 2nd level or higher.
See the "Planar Travel" section in chapter 2 of the Guia del Mestre de Masmorres for examples of planar portals.

subclassFeature.name: Ethereal Step
entries: A nivell 7, you learn to step through the Pla Etèri. Com a acció bonus en el teu torn, you can cast the {@spell etherealness} spell with this feature, but the spell ends al final del torn actual. Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Distant Strike
entries: A nivell 11, you gain the ability to step between the planes in a blink of an eye. Quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar}, you can teleport fins a 10 peus before each attack. You must be able to see the destination of the teleportation.
If you attack at least two different creatures with the action, you can make one additional attack with it against a third creature.

subclassFeature.name: Spectral Defense
entries: A nivell 15, your ability to move between planes becomes even more finely tuned. Com a reacció when you take damage, you can halve that damage against you. For a moment, you slip into the planar boundary to lessen the harm.

subclassFeature.name: Primeval Guardian
entries: {@note Note that this subclass is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger subclass.}

Rangers of the Primeval Guardian Conclave follow an ancient tradition rooted in powerful druidic magic. These rangers learn to become one with nature, allowing them to channel the aspects of various beasts and plants in order to overcome their foes.

These rangers dwell in the elder forests of the world. They venture out only rarely, as they consider it their sacred duty to protect the druidic groves and ancient trees that saw the earliest days of the world.

subclassFeature.name: Guardian Soul
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you gain the ability to temporarily grow and take on the appearance of a treelike person, covered with leaves and bark. Com a acció bonus, you assume this guardian form, which lasts until you end it com a acció bonus or until you are {@condition incapacitated}.
You undergo the following changes while in your guardian form:

items: Your size becomes Large, unless you were larger.
Any speed you have becomes 5 feet, unless the speed was lower.
Your reach increases by 5 feet.
You gain a number of punts de vida temporals a l'inici de cada torn teu. The number equals half your ranger level. When the form ends, you lose any punts de vida temporals you have from it.

subclassFeature.name: Piercing Thorns
entries: A nivell 3, your command of primal magic allows you to enhance your attacks with thorns. Un cop a cada torn teu, you can deal an additional {@damage 1d6} de dany perforant to one creature you hit with a weapon attack.

subclassFeature.name: Ancient Fortitude
entries: A nivell 7, you gain the endurance of the ancient forests. Els teus punts de vida màxims and punts de vida actuals increase by 2 per ranger level when you assume your guardian form. This increase lasts until you leave the form; els teus punts de vida màxims then returns to normal, but your punts de vida actuals remain the same, unless they must decrease to abide by els teus punts de vida màxims.

subclassFeature.name: Rooted Defense
entries: A nivell 11, you gain the ability to twist and turn the ground beneath you. While you are in your guardian form, the ground a 30 peus de tu is difficult terrain for your enemies.

subclassFeature.name: Guardian Aura
entries: Començant a nivell 15, your guardian form emanates a magical aura that fortifies your injured allies. When any ally starts their turn a 30 peus de tur guardian form, that ally regains a number of punts de vida equal to half your ranger level. This aura has no effect on a creature that has half or more of its punts de vida, and it has no effect on undead and constructs.

subclassFeature.name: Gloom Stalker
entries: {@note Note that this subclass is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger subclass.}

Gloom Stalkers are at home in the darkest places: deep under the earth, in gloomy alleyways, in primeval forests, and wherever else the light dims. Most folk enter such places with trepidation, but a Gloom Stalker ventures boldly into the darkness, seeking to ambush threats before they can reach the broader world. Such rangers are often found in the Sotafoscor, but they will go any place where evil lurks in the shadows.

subclassFeature.name: Dread Ambusher
entries: A nivell 3, you master the art of the ambush. You can give yourself a bonus to your initiative rolls equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa.

At the start of your first turn of each combat, la teva velocitat de caminar incrementa en 10 peus, which lasts until the end of that turn. Quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar} on that turn, you can make one additional weapon attack as part of that action. If that attack hits, L'objectiu rep an extra {@damage 1d8} damage of the weapon's damage type.

subclassFeature.name: Umbral Sight
entries: A nivell 3, you gain {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have {@sense darkvision} from your race, its range increases by 30 feet.

You are also adept at evading creatures that rely on {@sense darkvision}. While in darkness, you are {@condition invisible} to any creature that relies on {@sense darkvision} to see you in that darkness.

subclassFeature.name: Iron Mind
entries: A nivell 7, you have honed your ability to resist the mind-altering powers of your prey. Tens competència en salvades de Saviesa. If you already have this proficiency, you instead gain proficiency in Intel·ligència or Carisma saving throws (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Stalker's Flurry
entries: A nivell 11, you learn to attack with such unexpected speed that you can turn a miss into another strike. Un cop a cada torn teu when you miss with a weapon attack, you can make another weapon attack as part of the same action.

subclassFeature.name: Shadowy Dodge
entries: Començant a nivell 15, you can dodge in unforeseen ways, with wisps of supernatural shadow around you. Whenever a creature makes an attack roll against you and doesn't have advantage on the roll, pots, com a reacció, impose disadvantage on it. You must use this feature before you know the outcome of the attack roll.

subclassFeature.name: Horizon Walker
entries: {@note Note that this subclass is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger subclass.}

Horizon Walkers guard the world against threats that originate from other planes or that seek to ravage the mortal realm with otherworldly magic. They seek out planar portals and keep watch over them, venturing to the Inner Planes and the Outer Planes as needed to pursue their foes. These rangers are also friends to any forces in the multiverse—especially benevolent dragons, fey, and elementals—that work to preserve life and the order of the planes.

subclassFeature.name: Detect Portal
entries: A nivell 3, you gain the ability to magically sense the presence of a planar portal. Com a acció, you detect the distance and direction to the closest planar portal within 1 mile of you.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.
See the "Planar Travel" section in chapter 2 of the Guia del Mestre de Masmorres for examples of planar portals.

subclassFeature.name: Planar Warrior
entries: A nivell 3, you learn to draw on the energy of the multiverse to augment your attacks.

Com a acció bonus, escull una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu. The next time you hit that creature on this turn with a weapon attack, all damage dealt by the attack becomes force damage, and the creature takes an extra {@damage 1d8} de dany de força from the attack. Quan arribes a nivell 11 en aquesta classe, the extra damage increases to {@dice 2d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Ethereal Step
entries: A nivell 7, you learn to step through the Pla Etèri. Com a acció bonus, you can cast the {@spell etherealness} spell with this feature, sense gastar cap ranura de conjur, but the spell ends al final del torn actual.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Distant Strike
entries: A nivell 11, you gain the ability to pass between the planes in the blink of an eye. Quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar}, you can teleport fins a 10 peus before each attack en un espai desocupat que puguis veure.
If you attack at least two different creatures with the action, you can make one additional attack with it against a third creature.

subclassFeature.name: Spectral Defense
entries: A nivell 15, your ability to move between planes enables you to slip through the planar boundaries to lessen the harm done to you during battle. When you take damage from an attack, pots, com a reacció, give yourself resistance to all of that attack's damage on this turn.

subclassFeature.name: Monster Slayer
entries: {@note Note that this subclass is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger subclass.}

You have dedicated yourself to hunting down creatures of the night and wielders of grim magic. A Monster Slayer seeks out vampires, dragons, evil fey, diastres, and other magical threats. Trained in supernatural techniques to overcome such monsters, slayers are experts at unearthing and defeating mighty, mystical foes.

subclassFeature.name: Hunter's Sense
entries: A nivell 3, you gain the ability to peer at a creature and magically discern how best to hurt it. Com a acció, escull una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu. You immediately learn whether the creature has any damage immunities, resistances, or vulnerabilities and what they are. If the creature is hidden from divination magic, you sense that it has no damage immunities, resistances, or vulnerabilities.
Pots emprar aquest tret un número de cops equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim 1 cop). En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Slayer's Prey
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you can focus your ire on one foe, increasing the harm you inflict on it. Com a acció bonus, you designate one creature que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu as the target of this feature. The first time each turn that you hit that target with a weapon attack, it takes an extra {@damage 1d6} damage from the weapon.
This benefit lasts fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg. It ends early if you designate a different creature.

subclassFeature.name: Supernatural Defense
entries: A nivell 7, you gain extra resilience against your prey's assaults on your mind and body. Whenever the target of your Slayer's Prey forces you to make a saving throw and whenever you make an ability check to escape that target's grapple, add {@dice 1d6} to your roll.

subclassFeature.name: Magic-User's Nemesis
entries: A nivell 11, you gain the ability to thwart someone else's magic. When you see a creature casting a spell or teleporting a 60 peus de tu, pots, com a reacció, try to magically foil it. La criatura ha de salvar per Saviesa. contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur, or its spell or teleport fails and is wasted.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Slayer's Counter
entries: A nivell 15, you gain the ability to counterattack when your prey tries to sabotage you. If the target of your Slayer's Prey forces you to make a saving throw, pots, com a reacció, make one weapon attack against the quarry. You make this attack immediately before making the saving throw. If your attack hits, your save automatically succeeds, in addition to the attack's normal effects.

subclassFeature.name: Guardian
entries: By following the path of the Guardian, you protect the natural world from creatures that would despoil it, even as you engage with the common folk who rely upon nature's bounty to survive. You patrol the pathways through the wilds, keeping them clear of bandits and rampaging monsters, even as you keep careful watch on how civilized realms interact with the wilderness. Those who take more than their fair share—clear-cutting forests or hunting for sport rather than survival—risk your wrath.
When your spirit companion manifests, it takes the form of a {@creature brown bear}.

subclassFeature.name: Guardian's Shroud
entries: Your companion spirit helps to protect you and the creatures closest to you. Com a acció bonus, you invoke your spirit companion and choose yourself or an ally que puguis veure. La criatura designada gains punts de vida temporals equal to {@dice 2d6} + el teu modificador de Saviesa.

subclassFeature.name: Seeker
entries: By taking up the Seeker path, you are drawn into the unknown wilds far from civilization in search of lost treasures, forgotten evil, and sites of primal magic. You understand that the trackless wilderness can harbor many secrets. Some of those secrets—such as a lonely oasis providing water to a desert realm—must be protected. Others—such as an ancient idol infused with the foul magic of the demon worshippers who crafted it—must be destroyed before their evil awakens once more.
When your spirit companion manifests, it takes the form of a {@creature giant eagle}.

subclassFeature.name: Seeker's Eye
entries: Your companion spirit lends its sharp combat senses to you and your companions. Com a acció bonus, you invoke your spirit companion and choose una criatura que puguis veure. Fins el final del teu proper torn, all attacks made against la criatura designada have advantage.

subclassFeature.name: Stalker
entries: As a ranger of the Stalker path, you prowl the wilderness in search of aberrations, diastres, and other monsters that must be slain before they wreak havoc on the natural world. You are the power of nature's vengeance made manifest, and anything that poses a threat to nature is your target. When a powerful creature such as a dragon threatens a region, a ranger of the Stalker path leads the hunt that will take it down. Like others of your kind, you do not rest until your quarry is dead and the natural world is safe.
When your spirit companion manifests, it takes the form of a {@creature dire wolf}.

subclassFeature.name: Stalker's Fangs
entries: Your companion spirit lends the strength of its deadly bite to you or one of your companions. Com a acció bonus, you invoke your spirit companion and choose yourself or una criatura que puguis veure. The next time la criatura designada impacta amb un atac armat, the target of the attack takes extra slashing damage equal to {@dice 2d6} + el teu modificador de Saviesa.

subclassFeature.name: Fey Wanderer
entries: {@note Note that this subclass is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger subclass.}

A fey mystique surrounds you, thanks to the boon of an archfey, the shining fruit you ate from a talking tree, the magic spring you swam in, or some other auspicious event. However you acquired your fey magic, you are now a Fey Wanderer, a ranger who represents both the mortal and the fey realms. As you wander the multiverse, your joyful laughter brightens the hearts of the downtrodden, and your martial prowess strikes terror in your foes, for great is the mirth of the fey and dreadful is their fury.

subclassFeature.name: Dreadful Strikes
entries: {@i tret de Fey Wanderer a nivell 3}

You can augment your weapon strikes with mind-scarring magic, drawn from the gloomy hollows of la Terra Fata. Quan impactes a una criatura with a weapon, you can deal an extra {@damage 1d4} de dany psíquic to the target, which can take this extra damage only un cop per torn.
The extra damage increases to {@dice 1d6} quan arribes a nivell 11 en aquesta classe.

subclassFeature.name: Fey Wanderer Magic
entries: {@i tret de Fey Wanderer a nivell 3}

You learn an additional spell Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, as shown in the Fey Wanderer Spells table. Each spell counts as a ranger spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.
You also possess a preternatural blessing from a fey ally or a place of fey power. Choose your blessing from la Terra Fata Gifts table or determine it randomly.

entries.caption: Feywild Gifts
rows: Illusory butterflies flutter around you while you take a short or long rest.
Fresh, seasonal flowers sprout from your hair each dawn.
You faintly smell of cinnamon, lavender, nutmeg, or another comforting herb or spice.
Your shadow dances while no one is looking directly at it.
Horns or antlers sprout from your head.
Your skin and hair change color to match the season at each dawn.

subclassFeature.name: Otherworldly Glamur
entries: {@i tret de Fey Wanderer a nivell 3}
Your fey qualities give you a supernatural charm. As a result, whenever you make a Carisma check, you gain a bonus to the check equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim de +1).
A més, obténs competència en una de les habilitat següents (escull): {@skill Deception}, {@skill Performance}, or {@skill Persuasion}.

subclassFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Beguiling Twist
entries: {@i tret de Fey Wanderer a nivell 7}
The magic of la Terra Fata guards your mind. Tens avantatge a saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

A més, whenever you or una criatura que puguis veure a 120 peus de tu succeeds on a saving throw against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, pots, com a reacció, force a different creature que puguis veure a 120 peus de tu to make a Saviesa contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur. If the save fails, the target is {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} by you (escull) durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot tornar a salvar al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.

subclassFeature.name: Fey Reinforcements
entries: {@i tret de Fey Wanderer a nivell 11}

The royal courts of la Terra Fata have blessed you with the assistance of fey beings: you know {@spell summon fey|tce}. It doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know, and you can cast it without a material component. You can also cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so quan acabis un Descans Llarg.
Whenever you start casting the spell, you can modify it so that it doesn't require concentration. Si ho fas, the spell's duration becomes 1 minute for that casting.

subclassFeature.name: Misty Wanderer
entries: {@i tret de Fey Wanderer a nivell 15}

You can slip in and out of la Terra Fata to move in a blink of an eye: Pots llançar el conjur {@spell pas boira} sense gastar cap ranura de conjur. You can do so a number of times equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim 1 cop), i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

A més, whenever you cast {@i pas boira}, you can bring along one willing creature que puguis veure a 5 peus de tu. That creature teleports en un espai desocupat (escull) a 5 peus de tur destination space.

subclassFeature.name: Swarmkeeper
entries: {@note Note that this subclass is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger subclass.}

Feeling a deep connection to the environment around them, some rangers reach out through their magical connection to the world and bond with a swarm of nature spirits. The swarm becomes a potent force in battle, as well as helpful company for the ranger. Some Swarmkeepers are outcasts or hermits, keeping to themselves and their attendant swarms rather than dealing with the discomfort of others. Other Swarmkeepers enjoy building vibrant communities that work for the mutual benefit of all those they consider part of their swarm.

subclassFeature.name: Gathered Swarm
entries: {@i tret de Swarmkeeper a nivell 3}

A swarm of intangible nature spirits has bonded itself to you and can assist you in battle. Until you die, the swarm remains in your space, crawling on you or flying and skittering around you within your space. En determines l'aparença, or you generate its appearance by rolling on the Swarm Appearance table.
Un cop a cada torn teu, you can cause the swarm to assist you in one of the following ways, immediately after you hit a creature with an attack:

items: The attack's target takes {@damage 1d6} de dany perforant from the swarm.
The attack's target ha de salvar per Força. contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur or be moved by the swarm fins a 15 peus horizontally in a direction (escull).
You are moved by the swarm 5 feet horizontally in a direction (escull).

entries.name: It's Your Swarm
entries: A Swarmkeeper's swarm and spells are reflections of the character's bond with nature spirits. Take the opportunity to describe the swarm and the ranger's magic in play. For example, when your ranger casts gaseous form, they might appear to melt into the swarm, instead of a cloud of mist, or the {@spell ull arcà} spell could create an extension of your swarm that spies for you. Such descriptions don't change the effects of spells, but they are an exciting opportunity to explore your character's narrative through their class abilities. For more guidance on customizing spells, see the "Personalizing Spells" section in chapter 3.

Also, remember that the swarm's appearance is yours to customize, and don't feel confined to a single appearance. Perhaps the spirits' look changes with the ranger's mood or with the seasons. You decide!

subclassFeature.name: Swarmkeeper Magic
entries: {@i tret de Swarmkeeper a nivell 3}
aprèns el truc {@spell mà de mag} if you don't already know it. When you cast it, the hand takes the form of your swarming nature spirits.

You also learn an additional spell of 1st level or higher Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, as shown in the Swarmkeeper Spells table. Each spell counts as a ranger spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

subclassFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Writhing Tide
entries: {@i tret de Swarmkeeper a nivell 7}

You can condense part of your swarm into a focused mass that lifts you up. Com a acció bonus, you gain una velocitat de vol de 10 peus and can hover. L'efecte dura 1 minut or until you are {@condition incapacitated}.
Pots emprar aquest tret tants cops com el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Mighty Swarm
entries: {@i tret de Swarmkeeper a nivell 11}
Your Gathered Swarm grows mightier in the following ways:

items: The damage of Gathered Swarm increases to {@dice 1d8}.
Si una criatura fails its saving throw against being moved by Gathered Swarm, you can also cause the swarm to knock the creature {@condition prone}.
When you are moved by Gathered Swarm, it gives you half cover fins l'inici del teu proper torn.

subclassFeature.name: Swarming Dispersal
entries: {@i tret de Swarmkeeper a nivell 15}

You can discorporate into your swarm, avoiding danger. When you take damage, pots, com a reacció, give yourself resistance to that damage. You vanish into your swarm and then teleport en un espai desocupat que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu, where you reappear with the swarm.
Pots emprar aquest tret tants cops com el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Fey Wanderer
entries: {@note Note that this subclass is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger subclass.}

As a Fey Wanderer, you guard the border between la Terra Fata and the Pla Material, guiding the lost out of la Terra Fata and preventing dangerous fey from damaging the Pla Material. Your experience with both domains makes you an exceptional negotiator between inhabitants of these worlds, as you understand both humanoid mindsets and the wiles of the fey courts.
Fey Wanderers possess a preternatural blessing from a fey ally or a place of fey power. Choose your blessing from la Terra Fata Gifts table or determine it randomly.

entries.caption: Feywild Gifts
rows: Illusory butterflies flutter around you while you take a short or long rest.
Fresh, seasonal flowers sprout from your hair each dawn.
You faintly smell of cinnamon, lavender, nutmeg, or another comforting herb or spice.
Your shadow dances while no one is looking directly at it.
Delicate horns or antlers sprout from your head.
Your skin and hair change color to match the season at each dawn.

subclassFeature.name: Cunning Will
entries: {@i tret de Fey Wanderer a nivell 3}
Your experience with the fey has guarded your mind and sharpened your tongue. Tens avantatge a saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.
A més, obténs competència en una de les habilitat següents (escull): {@skill Deception}, {@skill Performance}, or {@skill Persuasion}.

subclassFeature.name: Dreadful Strikes
entries: {@i tret de Fey Wanderer a nivell 3}

You augment your attacks with mind-scarring magic, drawn from the gloomy hollows of the unseelie fey. You gain a bonus action that you can use to imbue the weapon, or weapons, you're currently holding with magic. Fins el final del torn, the weapons are magical, and they deal an extra {@damage 1d6} de dany psíquic on a hit. A creature can take this extra damage only un cop per torn.
When you engage in lluita amb armes duals, you can imbue your weapons as part of the same bonus action you use to make the attack.

subclassFeature.name: Fey Wanderer Magic
entries: {@i tret de Fey Wanderer a nivell 3}

You learn an additional spell Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, as shown in the Fey Wanderer Spells table. The spell counts as a ranger spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

subclassFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Blessings of the Courts
entries: {@i tret de Fey Wanderer a nivell 7}

You have learned eerie techniques from both the Gloaming Court and the Summer Court of la Terra Fata. Un cop a cada torn teu, quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, you can expend a spell slot to deal extra psychic damage. The extra damage is {@damage 3d6} de dany psíquic and la criatura ha de salvar per Saviesa. contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur or està {@condition frightened} de tu fins el final del teu proper torn.
A més, whenever you make a Carisma check, you gain a bonus to the check equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa.

subclassFeature.name: Beguiling Twist
entries: {@i tret de Fey Wanderer a nivell 11}

You learn how to manipulate mind-altering magic, channeling it from your allies toward others. Whenever una criatura que puguis veure a 120 peus de tu succeeds on a saving throw against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, pots, com a reacció, force a different creature que puguis veure a 120 peus de tu to succeed on a Saviesa contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur or suffer your choice of one of the following effects:

items: The creature is {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} by you (escull) durant 1 minut. The creature can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.
The creature takes {@damage 3d10} de dany psíquic.

subclassFeature.name: Misty Presence
entries: {@i tret de Fey Wanderer a nivell 15}

You can magically remove yourself from one creature's perception: you gain a bonus action that you can use to force una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu to make a Saviesa contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur. Si falla, the target can't see or hear you durant 24 hores. L'objectiu pot tornar a salvar at the end of any turn during which you hit it with an attack roll, forced it to make a saving throw, or dealt damage to it. The effect ends early if you use this bonus action again. Si supera, the target is immune to this feature for 7 days.
Once you've used this bonus action, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg or until you expend a spell slot of 4th level or higher to use it again.

subclassFeature.name: Drakewarden
entries: {@note Note that this subclass is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Spell-less Ranger subclass.}
Drakewardens are rangers who use their magical connection with nature to form an enduring bond with a minor dragon, a drake. This bond allows the ranger to summon the
drake to their side and to share in the awe-inspiring power wielded by dragons. Consider how your ranger gained their bond with the drake. The Drakewarden Origin table offers some examples.

rows: You studied a dragon's scale or claw, or a trinket from its hoard, and created your bond through the token's lingering draconic magic.
A secret order of rangers who collect and guard draconic lore taught you their ways.
A true dragon gave you a drake egg to care for. When it hatched, the drake bonded to you.
You drank a few drops of dragon blood, forever infusing your nature magic with draconic power.
An ancient Draconic inscription on a standing stone empowered you when you read it aloud.
You had a vivid dream of a mysterious man, accompanied by seven yellow canaries, who warned you of impending doom. When you awoke, your drake was there, watching you.

subclassFeature.name: Draconic Gift
entries: {@i tret de Drakewarden a nivell 3}
The bond you share with your drake creates a deeper connection to dragon kind, granting you understanding and empowering your presence. Reps els beneficis següents:

items: If you can't already, you learn to speak, read, and write {@language Draconic}.
aprèns el truc {@spell thaumaturgy}, which is a ranger spell for you.

subclassFeature.name: Company Dracó
entries: {@i tret de Drakewarden a nivell 3}
You can magically summon the drake bound to you. Com a acció, you can summon the drake, which appears en un espai desocupat (escull) que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu.

The drake is friendly to you and your companions and obeys your commands. See its game statistics in the {@creature Company Dracó|UA2020SubclassesPt5} stat block, which uses el teu bonus de competència (BC) in several places. When you summon the drake, choose a damage type listed in its Essència Dracònica trait. You can determine the cosmetic characteristics of the drake such as its color, scale texture, or any visible effect of its Essència Dracònica; your choice has no effect on its game statistics.

In combat, the drake shares your initiative count, but it takes its turn immediately after yours. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but the only action it takes on its turn is l'acció {@action Esquivar}, unless you take a bonus action en el teu torn to command it to take another action. That action can be one in its stat block or some other action. Si et quedes {@condition incapacitated}, the drake can take any action of its choice, not just {@action Esquivar}.
Once you summon the drake, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Llarg o fins que gastis una ranura de conjur of 1st level or higher to summon it.

The drake remains for a number of hours equal to el teu bonus de competència, until it is reduced to 0 punts de vida, until you use this feature to summon the drake again, or until you die. Anything the drake was wearing or carrying is left behind when the drake vanishes.

subclassFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Bond of Fang and Scale
entries: {@i tret de Drakewarden a nivell 7}
The bond you share with your drake intensifies, protecting you and stoking the drake's fury. While your drake is summoned, you and the drake gain the following benefits:

items: You gain resistance to the damage type chosen for the drake's Essència Dracònica.
Choose one of the following: the drake gains a swimming speed of 40 feet and can breathe both air and water, or the drake grows wings and gains una velocitat de vol de 40 peus.
The drake's bite attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} damage of the type chosen for its Essència Dracònica.

subclassFeature.name: Drake's Breath
entries: {@i tret de Drakewarden a nivell 11}

Com a acció, you can exhale a 30-foot cone of damaging breath or cause your drake to exhale it. Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage. Tota criatura in the cone ha de salvar per Destresa contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur, taking {@damage 6d6} damage si falla, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.
This damage increases to {@dice 8d6} quan arribes a nivell 15 en aquesta classe.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Llarg o fins que gastis una ranura de conjur of 3rd level or higher to use it again.

subclassFeature.name: Perfected Bond
entries: {@i tret de Drakewarden a nivell 15}
Your bond to your drake reaches the pinnacle of its power. While your drake is summoned, you and the drake gain the following benefits:

items: The drake grows to Large size.
The drake's bite attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} damage of the type chosen for its Essència Dracònica (for a total of {@damage 2d6} de dany extra).
When either you or the drake takes damage while you're within 30 feet of each other, pots, com a reacció, give yourself or the drake resistance to that instance of damage.

subclassFeature.name: Monster Slayer
entries: {@note Note that this subclass is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger subclass.}

Rangers of the Slayer Conclave seek out vampires, dragons, evil fey, diastres, and other powerful magical threats. Trained in a variety of arcane and divine techniques to overcome such monsters, slayers are experts at unearthing and defeating mighty foes.

subclassFeature.name: Slayer's Eye
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you gain the ability to study and unravel a creature's defenses. Com a acció bonus, escull una criatura que puguis veure a 120 peus de tu. You immediately learn the target's vulnerabilities, immunities, and resistances. You also learn any special effects triggered when L'objectiu rep damage, such as fire damage halting its regeneration.
A més, the first time each turn you hit the target with a weapon attack, L'objectiu rep an extra {@damage 1d6} damage from the weapon.
This benefit lasts until you target a different creature with this feature or fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Slayer's Mysticism
entries: You learn an additional spell Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, as shown in the Slayer Spells table. The spell counts as a ranger spell for you but doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

entries.caption: Monster Slayer Spells
rows: {@spell protegir del bé i del mal}

subclassFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Supernatural Defense
entries: A nivell 7, you gain extra resilience against your prey's assaults on your mind and body. Whenever the target of your Slayer's Eye forces you to make a saving throw, add {@dice 1d6} to your roll.

subclassFeature.name: Relentless Slayer
entries: A nivell 11, you gain the ability to foil your foe's ability to escape. Your study of folklore and arcane knowledge gives you a key insight to keep your prey cornered. If the target of your Slayer's Eye attempts to teleport, change its shape, travel to another plane of existence, or turn gaseous, pots, com a reacció, make a Saviesa check enfrontada a una tirada de Saviesa check made by the target. To use this ability, you must be able to see the target and need to be within 30 feet of it. Si superes, you foil its attempt, causing it to waste the action, bonus action, or reaction it used.

subclassFeature.name: Slayer's Counter
entries: A nivell 15, you gain the ability to counterattack when your prey tries to sabotage you. If the target of your Slayer's Eye forces you to make a saving throw, pots, com a reacció, make one weapon attack against it. You make this attack immediately before making the saving throw. Si impactes, your save automatically succeeds, in addition to the attack's normal effects.

subclassFeature.name: Swarmkeeper
entries: {@note Note that this subclass is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger subclass.}

Feeling a deep connection to the world around them, some rangers reach out through their magical connection to nature and gather a host of fey spirits, which take the form of swarming beasts—be they buzzing insects, fluttering birds, slippery squids, or otherwise. The swarm becomes a potent force in battle, as well as helpful—if potentially disturbing—company for the ranger. Some Swarmkeepers are outcasts or hermits, keeping to themselves and their attendant swarms rather than dealing with the discomfort of others. Other Swarmkeepers enjoy building vibrant communities that work for the mutual benefit of all those they consider part of their swarm.

subclassFeature.name: Gathered Swarm
entries: {@i tret de Swarmkeeper a nivell 3}

You magically attract a swarm of fey spirits that look like Tiny beasts (escull). The swarm remains in your space, crawling on you or through your clothing, or flying and skittering immediately around you within your space.

Com a acció bonus, you can agitate the swarm durant 1 minut. For the duration, some of the swarm clings to your weapons or follows your strikes when you attack: un cop a cada torn teu quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, you can deal an extra {@damage 1d6} de dany de força to that creature, and the swarm moves the creature fins a 5 peus toward you or away from you (escull). A nivell 11, the extra damage increases to {@dice 2d6}.
Pots emprar aquest tret un número de cops equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim 1 cop), i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Swarmkeeper Magic
entries: {@i tret de Swarmkeeper a nivell 3}

You learn the mage hand cantrip if you don't already know it. When you cast it, the hand takes the form of swarming nature spirits. You also learn an additional spell Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, as shown in the Swarmkeeper Spells table. These spells count as ranger spells for you, but don't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

subclassFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Writhing Tide
entries: {@i tret de Swarmkeeper a nivell 7}
You can condense part of your swarm into a focused mass that lifts or sweeps you along. Whenever you activate your Gathered Swarm feature, choose one of the following additional benefits:

items: La teva velocitat de caminar incrementa en 10 peus, and pots, com a acció bonus, prendre l'acció {@action Destravar-se}.
You gain a climb speed equal to your walking speed. You can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without making an ability check.
You gain una velocitat de vol de 10 peus and can hover.

subclassFeature.name: Gathered Swarm Improvement
entries: {@i tret de Swarmkeeper a nivell 11}
The extra damage from your swarm increases to {@dice 2d6}.

subclassFeature.name: Scuttling Eyes
entries: {@i tret de Swarmkeeper a nivell 11}

Com a acció, you can magically form one of the spirits of your swarm into the shape of a Tiny beast (escull). The transformation dura 1 hora, at which point the spirit disappears. For the duration, the spirit has a speed of 40 feet, which it can use to walk, climb, fly, or swim. The spirit has your senses and telepathically relays what it sees and hears to you. Durant el teu torn, you can speak through the spirit, telepathically command it to move, and it can {@action Amagar-se} using your bonus to Destresa ({@skill Stealth}). The spirit has AC 18. If it takes damage, you ha de salvar per Saviesa. (la CD és 10, or half the damage dealt, whichever is higher) or the spirit disappears.
Com a acció, you can dismiss the spirit early. If you do, you can magically teleport en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of where the spirit disappeared.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Llarg. You can also use it again by expending a spell slot of 3rd level or higher.

subclassFeature.name: Storm of Minions
entries: {@i tret de Swarmkeeper a nivell 15}

Your swarm can expel a seething storm of spirits that drains life from others. Com a acció, you create a magical sphere filled with an enraged swarm centered on a point que puguis veure a 120 peus de tu. The sphere has a 10-foot-radius and dura 1 minut. The sphere is difficult terrain for creatures other than you. A creature other than you that starts its turn in the sphere's area ha de salvar per Constitució contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur. Si falla, the creature takes {@damage 2d8} de dany necròtic and is {@condition blinded} fins el final del seu proper torn. Si supera, rep la meitat del dany and isn't {@condition blinded}. A l'inici del teu torn, if any number of Small or larger creatures took necrotic damage from the swarm, you regain {@dice 1d8} punts de vida. Als torns posteriors, pots, com a acció bonus, to move the sphere fins a 30 peus.
When you activate this feature, you can choose any number of creatures que puguis veure to be unaffected by it.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Llarg. You can also use it again by expending a spell slot of 4th level or higher.

subclassFeature.name: Horizon Walker
entries: {@note Note that this subclass is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger subclass.}

Rangers of the Horizon Conclave guard the world against threats that originate from other planes. They seek out planar portals and keep watch over them, venturing to the outer and inner planes as needed to defeat threats.

subclassFeature.name: Planar Magic
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you learn an additional spell Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, as shown in the Horizon Walker Spells table. The spell counts as a ranger spell for you, and it doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

entries.caption: Horizon Walker Spells
rows: {@spell protegir del bé i del mal}

subclassFeature.name: Planar Warrior
entries: A nivell 3, you learn to draw on the energy of the planes to augment your attacks.

Com a acció bonus, escull una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu. Until the end of this turn, your attacks contra aquella criatura ignore its damage resistances, and the next time you hit it on this turn, it takes an additional {@damage 1d6} de dany de força.

subclassFeature.name: Portal Lore
entries: A nivell 3, you gain the ability to detect the presence of planar portals. Com a acció, you detect the distance and direction to any planar portals within 1,000 feet of you. You also sense which plane of existence each portal leads to. However, if magic obscures any details of a portal, this feature doesn't reveal them.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg. Alternativament, you can use the feature again if you expend a spell slot of 2nd level or higher.
See the "Planar Travel" section in chapter 2 of the Guia del Mestre de Masmorres for examples of planar portals.

subclassFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Ethereal Step
entries: A nivell 7, you learn to step through the Pla Etèri. Com a acció bonus en el teu torn, you can cast the {@spell etherealness} spell with this feature, but the spell ends al final del torn actual. Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Distant Strike
entries: A nivell 11, you gain the ability to step between the planes in a blink of an eye. Quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar}, you can teleport fins a 10 peus before each attack. You must be able to see the destination of the teleportation.
If you attack at least two different creatures with the action, you can make one additional attack with it against a third creature.

subclassFeature.name: Spectral Defense
entries: A nivell 15, your ability to move between planes becomes even more finely tuned. Com a reacció when you take damage, you can halve that damage against you. For a moment, you slip into the planar boundary to lessen the harm.

subclassFeature.name: Primeval Guardian
entries: {@note Note that this subclass is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger subclass.}

Rangers of the Primeval Guardian Conclave follow an ancient tradition rooted in powerful druidic magic. These rangers learn to become one with nature, allowing them to channel the aspects of various beasts and plants in order to overcome their foes.

These rangers dwell in the elder forests of the world. They venture out only rarely, as they consider it their sacred duty to protect the druidic groves and ancient trees that saw the earliest days of the world.

subclassFeature.name: Guardian Magic
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you learn an additional spell Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, as shown in the Primeval Guardian Spells table. The spell counts as a ranger spell for you, and it doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

subclassFeature.name: Guardian Soul
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you gain the ability to temporarily grow and take on the appearance of a treelike person, covered with leaves and bark. Com a acció bonus, you assume this guardian form, which lasts until you end it com a acció bonus or until you are {@condition incapacitated}.
You undergo the following changes while in your guardian form:

items: Your size becomes Large, unless you were larger.
Any speed you have becomes 5 feet, unless the speed was lower.
Your reach increases by 5 feet.
You gain a number of punts de vida temporals a l'inici de cada torn teu. The number equals half your ranger level. When the form ends, you lose any punts de vida temporals you have from it.

subclassFeature.name: Piercing Thorns
entries: A nivell 3, your command of primal magic allows you to enhance your attacks with thorns. Un cop a cada torn teu, you can deal an additional {@damage 1d6} de dany perforant to one creature you hit with a weapon attack.

subclassFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Ancient Fortitude
entries: A nivell 7, you gain the endurance of the ancient forests. Els teus punts de vida màxims and punts de vida actuals increase by 2 per ranger level when you assume your guardian form. This increase lasts until you leave the form; els teus punts de vida màxims then returns to normal, but your punts de vida actuals remain the same, unless they must decrease to abide by els teus punts de vida màxims.

subclassFeature.name: Rooted Defense
entries: A nivell 11, you gain the ability to twist and turn the ground beneath you. While you are in your guardian form, the ground a 30 peus de tu is difficult terrain for your enemies.

subclassFeature.name: Guardian Aura
entries: Començant a nivell 15, your guardian form emanates a magical aura that fortifies your injured allies. When any ally starts their turn a 30 peus de tur guardian form, that ally regains a number of punts de vida equal to half your ranger level. This aura has no effect on a creature that has half or more of its punts de vida, and it has no effect on undead and constructs.

subclassFeature.name: Beast Conclave (UA)
entries: Many rangers are more at home in the wilds than in civilization, to the point where animals consider them kin. Rangers of the Beast Conclave develop a close bond with a beast, then further strengthen that bond through the use of magic.

subclassFeature.name: Animal Companion
entries: A nivell 3, you learn to use your magic to create a powerful bond with a creature of the natural world.

With 8 hours of work and the expenditure of 50 gp worth of rare herbs and fine food, you call forth an animal from the wilderness to serve as your faithful companion. You normally select you companion from among the following animals: an {@creature ape}, a {@creature black bear}, a {@creature boar}, a {@creature giant badger}, a {@creature giant weasel}, a {@creature mule}, a {@creature panther}, or a {@creature wolf}. However, your DM might pick one of these animals for you, based on the surrounding terrain and on what types of creatures would logically be present in the area.
At the end of the 8 hours, your animal companion appears and gains all the benefits of your Companion's Bond ability. You can have only one animal companion at a time.

If your animal companion is ever slain, the magical bond you share allows you to return it to life. With 8 hours of work and the expenditure of 25 gp worth of rare herbs and fine food, you call forth your companion's spirit and use your magic to create a new body for it. You can return an animal companion to life in this manner even if you do not possess any part of its body.
If you use this ability to return a former animal companion to life while you have a current animal companion, your current companion leaves you and is replaced by the restored companion.

subclassFeature.name: Companion's Bond
entries: Your animal companion gains a variety of benefits while it is linked to you.
The animal companion loses its Multiattack action, if it has one.

The companion obeys your commands as best it can. It rolls for initiative like any other creature, but you determine its actions, decisions, attitudes, and so on. Si et quedes {@condition incapacitated} or absent, your companion acts on its own.
When using your Natural Explorer feature, you and your animal companion can both move stealthily at a normal pace.

Your animal companion has abilities and game statistics determined in part by your level. Your companion uses el teu bonus de competència rather than its own. In addition to the areas where it normally uses its proficiency bonus, an animal companion also adds its proficiency bonus to its AC and to its damage rolls.
Your animal companion gains proficiency in two skills (escull). It also becomes proficient with all saving throws.
For each level you gain after 3rd, your animal companion gains an additional dau de vida and increases its punts de vida accordingly.

Whenever you gain the Millora de Puntuació de Característica class feature, your companion's abilities also improve. Your companion can increase one ability score (escull) by 2, or it can increase two ability scores (escull) by 1. As normal, your companion can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature unless its description specifies otherwise.

Your companion shares your alignment, and has a personality trait and a flaw that you can roll for or select from the tables below. Your companion shares your ideal, and its bond is always, "The ranger who travels with me is a beloved companion for whom I would gladly give my life."

Your animal companion gains the benefits of your Enemic Predilecte feature, and of your Greater Enemic Predilecte feature when you gain that feature a nivell 6. It uses the enemics predilectes you selected for those features.

entries.caption: Companion Trait
rows: I'm dauntless in the face of adversity.
I stay on alert so others can rest.
People see an animal and underestimate me.
I have a knack for showing up in the nick of time.
I put my friends' needs before my own in all things.

entries.caption: Companion Flaw
rows: If there's food left unattended, I'll eat it.
I growl at strangers, and all people except my ranger are strangers to me.
Any time is a good time for a belly rub.
My idea of hello is a flurry of licks to the face.
I jump on creatures to tell them how much I love them.

subclassFeature.name: Coordinated Attack
entries: Començant a nivell 5, you and your animal companion form a more potent fighting force. Quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn, if your companion can see you, it can use its reaction to make a atac cos a cos.

subclassFeature.name: Beast's Defense
entries: A nivell 7, while your companion can see you, it has advantage on all saving throws.

subclassFeature.name: Storm of Claw and Fangs
entries: A nivell 11, your companion can use its action to make a atac cos a cos against tota criatura of its choice within 5 feet of it, with a separate attack roll for each target.

subclassFeature.name: Superior Beast's Defense
entries: A nivell 15, whenever an attacker that your companion can see hits it with an attack, it can use its reaction to halve the attack's damage against it.

subclassFeature.name: Deep Stalker Conclave (UA)
entries: Most folk descend into the depths of the Sotafoscor only under the most pressing conditions, undertaking some desperate quest or following the promise of vast riches. All too often, evil festers beneath the earth unnoticed, and rangers of the Deep Stalker Conclave strive to uncover and defeat such threats before they can reach the surface.

subclassFeature.name: Deep Stalker Magic
entries: A nivell 3, you have {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 90 feet. If you already have {@sense darkvision}, you increase its range by 30 feet. You also gain access to additional spells at 3rd, 5th, 9th, 13th, and 15th level. Once you gain a deep stalker spell, it counts as a ranger spell for you but doesn't count against the number of rangers spells you know.

subclassFeature.name: Sotafoscor Scout
entries: A nivell 3, you master the art of the ambush. On your first turn during combat, Tens un +10 a your speed and if you use the attack action on that turn, you can make one additional attack. You are also adept at evading creatures that rely on {@sense darkvision}. Such creatures gain no benefit when attempting to detect you in dark and dim conditions. A més, when the DM determines if you can hide from a creature, that creature gains no benefit from its {@sense darkvision}.

subclassFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Iron Mind
entries: A nivell 7, tens competència en salvades de Saviesa.

subclassFeature.name: Stalker's Flurry
entries: Començant a nivell 11, un cop a cada torn teu when you miss with an attack, you can make another attack. You can gain one additional attack durant el teu torn with this ability.

subclassFeature.name: Stalker's Dodge
entries: A nivell 15, whenever a creature attacks you and does not have advantage, pots, com a reacció, impose disadvantage on the creature's attack roll against you. You can use this feature before or after the attack roll is made, but it must be used before the outcome of the roll is determined.

subclassFeature.name: Hunter Conclave (UA)
entries: Some rangers seek to master weapons to better protect civilization from the terrors of the wilderness. Members of the Hunter Conclave learn specialized fighting techniques for use against the most dire threats, from rampaging ogres and hordes of orcs to towering giants and terrifying dragons.

subclassFeature.name: Horde Breaker
entries: Un cop a cada torn teu when you make a weapon attack, you can make another attack with the same weapon against a different creature that is within 5 feet of the original target and within range of your weapon.

subclassFeature.name: Hunter's Prey
entries: A nivell 3, obténs un dels trets següents (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Colossus Slayer
entries: Your tenacity can wear down the most potent foes. Quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat, the creature takes an extra {@damage 1d8} damage if it's below its punts de vida màxims. You can deal this extra damage only un cop per torn.

subclassFeature.name: Giant Killer
entries: When a Large or larger creature a 5 peus de tu hits or misses you with an attack, pots, com a reacció, attack that creature immediately after its attack, provided que puguis veure the creature.

subclassFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Defensive Tactics
entries: A nivell 7, obténs un dels trets següents (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Escape the Horde
entries: Opportunity attacks against you are made with disadvantage.

subclassFeature.name: Multiattack Defense
entries: Quan una criatura t'impacta amb un atac, tens +4 a la CA against all subsequent attacks made by that creature for the rest of the turn.

subclassFeature.name: Steel Will
entries: Tens avantatge a saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

subclassFeature.name: Multiattack
entries: A nivell 11, obténs un dels trets següents (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Volley
entries: Pots, com a acció, to make a atac a distància against any number of creatures within 10 feet of a point que puguis veure within your weapon's range. You must have ammunition for each target, as normal, and you make a separate attack roll for each target.

subclassFeature.name: Whirlwind Attack
entries: Pots, com a acció, to make a atac cos a cos against any number of creatures a 5 peus de tu, with a separate attack roll for each target.

subclassFeature.name: Evasió
entries: You can nimbly dodge out of the way of certain area effects, such as a red dragon's fiery breath or a {@spell llampec} spell. Si has de salvar per Destresa contra un efecte pel que rebràs la meitat de dany si superes la salvada, no rebràs cap dany si superes la salvada, i només en rebràs la meitat si la falles.

subclassFeature.name: Stand Against the Tide
entries: When a hostile creature misses you amb un atac cos a cos, pots, com a reacció, force that creature to repeat the same attack against another creature (other than itself) (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Superior Hunter's Defense
entries: A nivell 15, obténs un dels trets següents (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Esquivar l'Impossible
entries: When an attacker que puguis veure t'impacta amb un atac, pots, com a reacció, rebré només la meitat del dany.

subclassFeature.name: Gloom Stalker
entries: {@note Note that this subclass is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger subclass.}

Gloom Stalkers are at home in the darkest places: deep under the earth, in gloomy alleyways, in primeval forests, and wherever else the light dims. Most folk enter such places with trepidation, but a Gloom Stalker ventures boldly into the darkness, seeking to ambush threats before they can reach the broader world. Such rangers are often found in the Sotafoscor, but they will go any place where evil lurks in the shadows.

subclassFeature.name: Dread Ambusher
entries: A nivell 3, you master the art of the ambush. You can give yourself a bonus to your initiative rolls equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa.

At the start of your first turn of each combat, la teva velocitat de caminar incrementa en 10 peus, which lasts until the end of that turn. Quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar} on that turn, you can make one additional weapon attack as part of that action. If that attack hits, L'objectiu rep an extra {@damage 1d8} damage of the weapon's damage type.

subclassFeature.name: Gloom Stalker Magic
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you learn an additional spell Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, as shown in the Gloom Stalker Spells table. The spell counts as a ranger spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

subclassFeature.name: Umbral Sight
entries: A nivell 3, you gain {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have {@sense darkvision} from your race, its range increases by 30 feet.

You are also adept at evading creatures that rely on {@sense darkvision}. While in darkness, you are {@condition invisible} to any creature that relies on {@sense darkvision} to see you in that darkness.

subclassFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Iron Mind
entries: A nivell 7, you have honed your ability to resist the mind-altering powers of your prey. Tens competència en salvades de Saviesa. If you already have this proficiency, you instead gain proficiency in Intel·ligència or Carisma saving throws (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Stalker's Flurry
entries: A nivell 11, you learn to attack with such unexpected speed that you can turn a miss into another strike. Un cop a cada torn teu when you miss with a weapon attack, you can make another weapon attack as part of the same action.

subclassFeature.name: Shadowy Dodge
entries: Començant a nivell 15, you can dodge in unforeseen ways, with wisps of supernatural shadow around you. Whenever a creature makes an attack roll against you and doesn't have advantage on the roll, pots, com a reacció, impose disadvantage on it. You must use this feature before you know the outcome of the attack roll.

subclassFeature.name: Horizon Walker
entries: {@note Note that this subclass is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger subclass.}

Horizon Walkers guard the world against threats that originate from other planes or that seek to ravage the mortal realm with otherworldly magic. They seek out planar portals and keep watch over them, venturing to the Inner Planes and the Outer Planes as needed to pursue their foes. These rangers are also friends to any forces in the multiverse—especially benevolent dragons, fey, and elementals—that work to preserve life and the order of the planes.

subclassFeature.name: Detect Portal
entries: A nivell 3, you gain the ability to magically sense the presence of a planar portal. Com a acció, you detect the distance and direction to the closest planar portal within 1 mile of you.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.
See the "Planar Travel" section in chapter 2 of the Guia del Mestre de Masmorres for examples of planar portals.

subclassFeature.name: Horizon Walker Magic
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you learn an additional spell Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, as shown in the Horizon Walker Spells table. The spell counts as a ranger spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

entries.caption: Horizon Walker Spells
rows: {@spell protegir del bé i del mal}

subclassFeature.name: Planar Warrior
entries: A nivell 3, you learn to draw on the energy of the multiverse to augment your attacks.

Com a acció bonus, escull una criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu. The next time you hit that creature on this turn with a weapon attack, all damage dealt by the attack becomes force damage, and the creature takes an extra {@damage 1d8} de dany de força from the attack. Quan arribes a nivell 11 en aquesta classe, the extra damage increases to {@dice 2d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Ethereal Step
entries: A nivell 7, you learn to step through the Pla Etèri. Com a acció bonus, you can cast the {@spell etherealness} spell with this feature, sense gastar cap ranura de conjur, but the spell ends al final del torn actual.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Distant Strike
entries: A nivell 11, you gain the ability to pass between the planes in the blink of an eye. Quan prèns l'acció {@action Atacar}, you can teleport fins a 10 peus before each attack en un espai desocupat que puguis veure.
If you attack at least two different creatures with the action, you can make one additional attack with it against a third creature.

subclassFeature.name: Spectral Defense
entries: A nivell 15, your ability to move between planes enables you to slip through the planar boundaries to lessen the harm done to you during battle. When you take damage from an attack, pots, com a reacció, give yourself resistance to all of that attack's damage on this turn.

subclassFeature.name: Monster Slayer
entries: {@note Note that this subclass is intended for use with the Ranger class presented in the Player's Handbook. It is presented here for convenience, and may be unsuitable for use as a Revised Ranger subclass.}

You have dedicated yourself to hunting down creatures of the night and wielders of grim magic. A Monster Slayer seeks out vampires, dragons, evil fey, diastres, and other magical threats. Trained in supernatural techniques to overcome such monsters, slayers are experts at unearthing and defeating mighty, mystical foes.

subclassFeature.name: Hunter's Sense
entries: A nivell 3, you gain the ability to peer at a creature and magically discern how best to hurt it. Com a acció, escull una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu. You immediately learn whether the creature has any damage immunities, resistances, or vulnerabilities and what they are. If the creature is hidden from divination magic, you sense that it has no damage immunities, resistances, or vulnerabilities.
Pots emprar aquest tret un número de cops equivalent al teu modificador de Saviesa (mínim 1 cop). En recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Monster Slayer Magic
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you learn an additional spell Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, as shown in the Monster Slayer Spells table. The spell counts as a ranger spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

entries.caption: Monster Slayer Spells
rows: {@spell protegir del bé i del mal}

subclassFeature.name: Slayer's Prey
entries: Començant a nivell 3, you can focus your ire on one foe, increasing the harm you inflict on it. Com a acció bonus, you designate one creature que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu as the target of this feature. The first time each turn that you hit that target with a weapon attack, it takes an extra {@damage 1d6} damage from the weapon.
This benefit lasts fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg. It ends early if you designate a different creature.

subclassFeature.name: Atac Extra
entries: Començant a nivell 5, pots atacar 2 cops (i no 1) quan prenguis l'acció {@action Atacar} en el teu torn.

subclassFeature.name: Supernatural Defense
entries: A nivell 7, you gain extra resilience against your prey's assaults on your mind and body. Whenever the target of your Slayer's Prey forces you to make a saving throw and whenever you make an ability check to escape that target's grapple, add {@dice 1d6} to your roll.

subclassFeature.name: Magic-User's Nemesis
entries: A nivell 11, you gain the ability to thwart someone else's magic. When you see a creature casting a spell or teleporting a 60 peus de tu, pots, com a reacció, try to magically foil it. La criatura ha de salvar per Saviesa. contra la teva CD de salvació de conjur, or its spell or teleport fails and is wasted.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Slayer's Counter
entries: A nivell 15, you gain the ability to counterattack when your prey tries to sabotage you. If the target of your Slayer's Prey forces you to make a saving throw, pots, com a reacció, make one weapon attack against the quarry. You make this attack immediately before making the saving throw. If your attack hits, your save automatically succeeds, in addition to the attack's normal effects.
